4428 res = DIR_READ_FILE(&dj);
4429 if (res != FR_OK)
4430 break;
4431 if (ccl == ld_clust(fs, dj.dir))
4432 break; /* Found the entry */
4433 res = dir_next(&dj, 0);
4434 } while (res == FR_OK);
4435 if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
4436 res = FR_INT_ERR; /* It cannot be 'not found'. */
4437 if (res != FR_OK)
4438 break;
4439 get_fileinfo(&dj, &fno); /* Get the directory name and push it to the buffer */
4440 for (n = 0; fno.fname[n]; n++)
4441 ; /* Name length */
4442 if (i < n + 1) { /* Insufficient space to store the path name? */
4443 res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE;
4444 break;
4445 }
4446 while (n)
4447 buff[--i] = fno.fname[--n]; /* Stack the name */
4448 buff[--i] = '/';
4449 }
4450 }
4451 if (res == FR_OK) {
4452 if (i == len)
4453 buff[--i] = '/'; /* Is it the root-directory? */
4454#if FF_VOLUMES >= 2 /* Put drive prefix */
4455 vl = 0;
4456#if FF_STR_VOLUME_ID >= 1 /* String volume ID */
4457 for (n = 0, vp = (const char*)VolumeStr[CurrVol]; vp[n]; n++)
4458 ;
4459 if (i >= n + 2) {
4460 if (FF_STR_VOLUME_ID == 2)
4461 *tp++ = (TCHAR)'/';
4462 for (vl = 0; vl < n; *tp++ = (TCHAR)vp[vl], vl++)
4463 ;
4464 if (FF_STR_VOLUME_ID == 1)
4465 *tp++ = (TCHAR)':';
4466 vl++;
4467 }
4468#else /* Numeric volume ID */
4469 if (i >= 3) {
4470 *tp++ = (TCHAR)'0' + CurrVol;
4471 *tp++ = (TCHAR)':';
4472 vl = 2;
4473 }
4474#endif
4475 if (vl == 0)
4476 res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE;
4477#endif
4478 /* Add current directory path */
4479 if (res == FR_OK) {
4480 do { /* Copy stacked path string */
4481 *tp++ = buff[i++];
4482 } while (i < len);
4483 }
4484 }
4485 FREE_NAMBUF();
4486 }
4487
4488 *tp = 0;
4489 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4490}
4491
4492#endif /* FF_FS_RPATH >= 2 */
4493#endif /* FF_FS_RPATH >= 1 */
4494
4495#if FF_FS_MINIMIZE <= 2
4496/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4497/* Seek File Read/Write Pointer */
4498/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4499
4500FRESULT f_lseek(
4501 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
4502 FSIZE_t ofs /* File pointer from top of file */
4503) {
4504 FRESULT res;
4505 FATFS* fs;
4506 DWORD clst, bcs;
4507 LBA_t nsect;
4508 FSIZE_t ifptr;
4509#if FF_USE_FASTSEEK
4510 DWORD cl, pcl, ncl, tcl, tlen, ulen;
4511 DWORD* tbl;
4512 LBA_t dsc;
4513#endif
4514
4515 res = validate(&fp->obj, &fs); /* Check validity of the file object */
4516 if (res == FR_OK)
4517 res = (FRESULT)fp->err;
4518#if FF_FS_EXFAT && !FF_FS_READONLY
4519 if (res == FR_OK && fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
4520 res = fill_last_frag(&fp->obj, fp->clust, 0xFFFFFFFF); /* Fill last fragment on the FAT if needed */
4521 }
4522#endif
4523 if (res != FR_OK)
4524 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4525
4526#if FF_USE_FASTSEEK
4527 if (fp->cltbl) { /* Fast seek */
4528 if (ofs == CREATE_LINKMAP) { /* Create CLMT */
4529 tbl = fp->cltbl;
4530 tlen = *tbl++;
4531 ulen = 2; /* Given table size and required table size */
4532 cl = fp->obj.sclust; /* Origin of the chain */
4533 if (cl != 0) {
4534 do {
4535 /* Get a fragment */
4536 tcl = cl;
4537 ncl = 0;
4538 ulen += 2; /* Top, length and used items */
4539 do {
4540 pcl = cl;
4541 ncl++;
4542 cl = get_fat(&fp->obj, cl);
4543 if (cl <= 1)
4544 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4545 if (cl == 0xFFFFFFFF)
4546 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4547 } while (cl == pcl + 1);
4548 if (ulen <= tlen) { /* Store the length and top of the fragment */
4549 *tbl++ = ncl;
4550 *tbl++ = tcl;
4551 }
4552 } while (cl < fs->n_fatent); /* Repeat until end of chain */
4553 }
4554 *fp->cltbl = ulen; /* Number of items used */
4555 if (ulen <= tlen) {
4556 *tbl = 0; /* Terminate table */
4557 } else {
4558 res = FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE; /* Given table size is smaller than required */
4559 }
4560 } else { /* Fast seek */
4561 if (ofs > fp->obj.objsize)
4562 ofs = fp->obj.objsize; /* Clip offset at the file size */
4563 fp->fptr = ofs; /* Set file pointer */
4564 if (ofs > 0) {
4565 fp->clust = clmt_clust(fp, ofs - 1);
4566 dsc = clst2sect(fs, fp->clust);
4567 if (dsc == 0)
4568 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4569 dsc += (DWORD)((ofs - 1) / SS(fs)) & (fs->csize - 1);
4570 if (fp->fptr % SS(fs) && dsc != fp->sect) { /* Refill sector cache if needed */
4571#if !FF_FS_TINY
4572#if !FF_FS_READONLY
4573 if (fp->flag & FA_DIRTY) { /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
4574 if (disk_write(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, fp->sect, 1) != RES_OK)
4575 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4576 fp->flag &= (BYTE)~FA_DIRTY;
4577 }
4578#endif
4579 if (disk_read(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, dsc, 1) != RES_OK)
4580 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR); /* Load current sector */
4581#endif
4582 fp->sect = dsc;
4583 }
4584 }
4585 }
4586 } else
4587#endif
4588
4589 /* Normal Seek */
4590 {
4591#if FF_FS_EXFAT
4592 if (fs->fs_type != FS_EXFAT && ofs >= 0x100000000)
4593 ofs = 0xFFFFFFFF; /* Clip at 4 GiB - 1 if at FATxx */
4594#endif
4595 if (ofs > fp->obj.objsize && (FF_FS_READONLY || !(fp->flag & FA_WRITE))) { /* In read-only mode, clip offset with the file size */
4596 ofs = fp->obj.objsize;
4597 }
4598 ifptr = fp->fptr;
4599 fp->fptr = nsect = 0;
4600 if (ofs > 0) {
4601 bcs = (DWORD)fs->csize * SS(fs); /* Cluster size (byte) */
4602 if (ifptr > 0 && (ofs - 1) / bcs >= (ifptr - 1) / bcs) { /* When seek to same or following cluster, */
4603 fp->fptr = (ifptr - 1) & ~(FSIZE_t)(bcs - 1); /* start from the current cluster */
4604 ofs -= fp->fptr;
4605 clst = fp->clust;
4606 } else { /* When seek to back cluster, */
4607 clst = fp->obj.sclust; /* start from the first cluster */
4608#if !FF_FS_READONLY
4609 if (clst == 0) { /* If no cluster chain, create a new chain */
4610 clst = create_chain(&fp->obj, 0);
4611 if (clst == 1)
4612 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4613 if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF)
4614 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4615 fp->obj.sclust = clst;
4616 }
4617#endif
4618 fp->clust = clst;
4619 }
4620 if (clst != 0) {
4621 while (ofs > bcs) { /* Cluster following loop */
4622 ofs -= bcs;
4623 fp->fptr += bcs;
4624#if !FF_FS_READONLY
4625 if (fp->flag & FA_WRITE) { /* Check if in write mode or not */
4626 if (FF_FS_EXFAT && fp->fptr > fp->obj.objsize) { /* No FAT chain object needs correct objsize to generate FAT value */
4627 fp->obj.objsize = fp->fptr;
4628 fp->flag |= FA_MODIFIED;
4629 }
4630 clst = create_chain(&fp->obj, clst); /* Follow chain with forceed stretch */
4631 if (clst == 0) { /* Clip file size in case of disk full */
4632 ofs = 0;
4633 break;
4634 }
4635 } else
4636#endif
4637 {
4638 clst = get_fat(&fp->obj, clst); /* Follow cluster chain if not in write mode */
4639 }
4640 if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF)
4641 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4642 if (clst <= 1 || clst >= fs->n_fatent)
4643 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4644 fp->clust = clst;
4645 }
4646 fp->fptr += ofs;
4647 if (ofs % SS(fs)) {
4648 nsect = clst2sect(fs, clst); /* Current sector */
4649 if (nsect == 0)
4650 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
4651 nsect += (DWORD)(ofs / SS(fs));
4652 }
4653 }
4654 }
4655 if (!FF_FS_READONLY && fp->fptr > fp->obj.objsize) { /* Set file change flag if the file size is extended */
4656 fp->obj.objsize = fp->fptr;
4657 fp->flag |= FA_MODIFIED;
4658 }
4659 if (fp->fptr % SS(fs) && nsect != fp->sect) { /* Fill sector cache if needed */
4660#if !FF_FS_TINY
4661#if !FF_FS_READONLY
4662 if (fp->flag & FA_DIRTY) { /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
4663 if (disk_write(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, fp->sect, 1) != RES_OK)
4664 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
4665 fp->flag &= (BYTE)~FA_DIRTY;
4666 }
4667#endif
4668 if (disk_read(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, nsect, 1) != RES_OK)
4669 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR); /* Fill sector cache */
4670#endif
4671 fp->sect = nsect;
4672 }
4673 }
4674
4675 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4676}
4677
4678#if FF_FS_MINIMIZE <= 1
4679/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4680/* Create a Directory Object */
4681/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4682
4683FRESULT f_opendir(
4684 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to directory object to create */
4685 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
4686) {
4687 FRESULT res;
4688 FATFS* fs;
4689 DEF_NAMBUF
4690
4691 if (!dp)
4692 return FR_INVALID_OBJECT;
4693
4694 /* Get logical drive */
4695 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, 0);
4696 if (res == FR_OK) {
4697 dp->obj.fs = fs;
4698 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
4699 res = follow_path(dp, path); /* Follow the path to the directory */
4700 if (res == FR_OK) { /* Follow completed */
4701 if (!(dp->fn[NSFLAG] & NS_NONAME)) { /* It is not the origin directory itself */
4702 if (dp->obj.attr & AM_DIR) { /* This object is a sub-directory */
4703#if FF_FS_EXFAT
4704 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
4705 dp->obj.c_scl = dp->obj.sclust; /* Get containing directory inforamation */
4706 dp->obj.c_size = ((DWORD)dp->obj.objsize & 0xFFFFFF00) | dp->obj.stat;
4707 dp->obj.c_ofs = dp->blk_ofs;
4708 init_alloc_info(fs, &dp->obj); /* Get object allocation info */
4709 } else
4710#endif
4711 {
4712 dp->obj.sclust = ld_clust(fs, dp->dir); /* Get object allocation info */
4713 }
4714 } else { /* This object is a file */
4715 res = FR_NO_PATH;
4716 }
4717 }
4718 if (res == FR_OK) {
4719 dp->obj.id = fs->id;
4720 res = dir_sdi(dp, 0); /* Rewind directory */
4721#if FF_FS_LOCK
4722 if (res == FR_OK) {
4723 if (dp->obj.sclust != 0) {
4724 dp->obj.lockid = inc_share(dp, 0); /* Lock the sub directory */
4725 if (!dp->obj.lockid)
4726 res = FR_TOO_MANY_OPEN_FILES;
4727 } else {
4728 dp->obj.lockid = 0; /* Root directory need not to be locked */
4729 }
4730 }
4731#endif
4732 }
4733 }
4734 FREE_NAMBUF();
4735 if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
4736 res = FR_NO_PATH;
4737 }
4738 if (res != FR_OK)
4739 dp->obj.fs = 0; /* Invalidate the directory object if function failed */
4740
4741 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4742}
4743
4744/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4745/* Close Directory */
4746/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4747
4748FRESULT f_closedir(
4749 DIR* dp /* Pointer to the directory object to be closed */
4750) {
4751 FRESULT res;
4752 FATFS* fs;
4753
4754 res = validate(&dp->obj, &fs); /* Check validity of the file object */
4755 if (res == FR_OK) {
4756#if FF_FS_LOCK
4757 if (dp->obj.lockid)
4758 res = dec_share(dp->obj.lockid); /* Decrement sub-directory open counter */
4759 if (res == FR_OK)
4760 dp->obj.fs = 0; /* Invalidate directory object */
4761#else
4762 dp->obj.fs = 0; /* Invalidate directory object */
4763#endif
4764#if FF_FS_REENTRANT
4765 unlock_volume(fs, FR_OK); /* Unlock volume */
4766#endif
4767 }
4768 return res;
4769}
4770
4771/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4772/* Read Directory Entries in Sequence */
4773/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4774
4775FRESULT f_readdir(
4776 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to the open directory object */
4777 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to file information to return */
4778) {
4779 FRESULT res;
4780 FATFS* fs;
4781 DEF_NAMBUF
4782
4783 res = validate(&dp->obj, &fs); /* Check validity of the directory object */
4784 if (res == FR_OK) {
4785 if (!fno) {
4786 res = dir_sdi(dp, 0); /* Rewind the directory object */
4787 } else {
4788 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
4789 res = DIR_READ_FILE(dp); /* Read an item */
4790 if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
4791 res = FR_OK; /* Ignore end of directory */
4792 if (res == FR_OK) { /* A valid entry is found */
4793 get_fileinfo(dp, fno); /* Get the object information */
4794 res = dir_next(dp, 0); /* Increment index for next */
4795 if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
4796 res = FR_OK; /* Ignore end of directory now */
4797 }
4798 FREE_NAMBUF();
4799 }
4800 }
4801 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4802}
4803
4804#if FF_USE_FIND
4805/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4806/* Find Next File */
4807/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4808
4809FRESULT f_findnext(
4810 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to the open directory object */
4811 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to the file information structure */
4812) {
4813 FRESULT res;
4814
4815 for (;;) {
4816 res = f_readdir(dp, fno); /* Get a directory item */
4817 if (res != FR_OK || !fno || !fno->fname[0])
4818 break; /* Terminate if any error or end of directory */
4819 if (pattern_match(dp->pat, fno->fname, 0, FIND_RECURS))
4820 break; /* Test for the file name */
4821#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_USE_FIND == 2
4822 if (pattern_match(dp->pat, fno->altname, 0, FIND_RECURS))
4823 break; /* Test for alternative name if exist */
4824#endif
4825 }
4826 return res;
4827}
4828
4829/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4830/* Find First File */
4831/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4832
4833FRESULT f_findfirst(
4834 DIR* dp, /* Pointer to the blank directory object */
4835 FILINFO* fno, /* Pointer to the file information structure */
4836 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the directory to open */
4837 const TCHAR* pattern /* Pointer to the matching pattern */
4838) {
4839 FRESULT res;
4840
4841 dp->pat = pattern; /* Save pointer to pattern string */
4842 res = f_opendir(dp, path); /* Open the target directory */
4843 if (res == FR_OK) {
4844 res = f_findnext(dp, fno); /* Find the first item */
4845 }
4846 return res;
4847}
4848
4849#endif /* FF_USE_FIND */
4850
4851#if FF_FS_MINIMIZE == 0
4852/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4853/* Get File Status */
4854/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4855
4856FRESULT f_stat(
4857 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file path */
4858 FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to file information to return */
4859) {
4860 FRESULT res;
4861 DIR dj;
4862 DEF_NAMBUF
4863
4864 /* Get logical drive */
4865 res = mount_volume(&path, &dj.obj.fs, 0);
4866 if (res == FR_OK) {
4867 INIT_NAMBUF(dj.obj.fs);
4868 res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
4869 if (res == FR_OK) { /* Follow completed */
4870 if (dj.fn[NSFLAG] & NS_NONAME) { /* It is origin directory */
4871 res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
4872 } else { /* Found an object */
4873 if (fno)
4874 get_fileinfo(&dj, fno);
4875 }
4876 }
4877 FREE_NAMBUF();
4878 }
4879
4880 LEAVE_FF(dj.obj.fs, res);
4881}
4882
4883#if !FF_FS_READONLY
4884/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4885/* Get Number of Free Clusters */
4886/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4887
4888FRESULT f_getfree(
4889 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number */
4890 DWORD* nclst, /* Pointer to a variable to return number of free clusters */
4891 FATFS** fatfs /* Pointer to return pointer to corresponding filesystem object */
4892) {
4893 FRESULT res;
4894 FATFS* fs;
4895 DWORD nfree, clst, stat;
4896 LBA_t sect;
4897 UINT i;
4898 FFOBJID obj;
4899
4900 /* Get logical drive */
4901 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, 0);
4902 if (res == FR_OK) {
4903 *fatfs = fs; /* Return ptr to the fs object */
4904 /* If free_clst is valid, return it without full FAT scan */
4905 if (fs->free_clst <= fs->n_fatent - 2) {
4906 *nclst = fs->free_clst;
4907 } else {
4908 /* Scan FAT to obtain number of free clusters */
4909 nfree = 0;
4910 if (fs->fs_type == FS_FAT12) { /* FAT12: Scan bit field FAT entries */
4911 clst = 2;
4912 obj.fs = fs;
4913 do {
4914 stat = get_fat(&obj, clst);
4915 if (stat == 0xFFFFFFFF) {
4916 res = FR_DISK_ERR;
4917 break;
4918 }
4919 if (stat == 1) {
4920 res = FR_INT_ERR;
4921 break;
4922 }
4923 if (stat == 0)
4924 nfree++;
4925 } while (++clst < fs->n_fatent);
4926 } else {
4927#if FF_FS_EXFAT
4928 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) { /* exFAT: Scan allocation bitmap */
4929 BYTE bm;
4930 UINT b;
4931
4932 clst = fs->n_fatent - 2; /* Number of clusters */
4933 sect = fs->bitbase; /* Bitmap sector */
4934 i = 0; /* Offset in the sector */
4935 do { /* Counts numbuer of bits with zero in the bitmap */
4936 if (i == 0) { /* New sector? */
4937 res = move_window(fs, sect++);
4938 if (res != FR_OK)
4939 break;
4940 }
4941 for (b = 8, bm = ~fs->win[i]; b && clst; b--, clst--) {
4942 nfree += bm & 1;
4943 bm >>= 1;
4944 }
4945 i = (i + 1) % SS(fs);
4946 } while (clst);
4947 } else
4948#endif
4949 { /* FAT16/32: Scan WORD/DWORD FAT entries */
4950 clst = fs->n_fatent; /* Number of entries */
4951 sect = fs->fatbase; /* Top of the FAT */
4952 i = 0; /* Offset in the sector */
4953 do { /* Counts numbuer of entries with zero in the FAT */
4954 if (i == 0) { /* New sector? */
4955 res = move_window(fs, sect++);
4956 if (res != FR_OK)
4957 break;
4958 }
4959 if (fs->fs_type == FS_FAT16) {
4960 if (ld_word(fs->win + i) == 0)
4961 nfree++;
4962 i += 2;
4963 } else {
4964 if ((ld_dword(fs->win + i) & 0x0FFFFFFF) == 0)
4965 nfree++;
4966 i += 4;
4967 }
4968 i %= SS(fs);
4969 } while (--clst);
4970 }
4971 }
4972 if (res == FR_OK) { /* Update parameters if succeeded */
4973 *nclst = nfree; /* Return the free clusters */
4974 fs->free_clst = nfree; /* Now free_clst is valid */
4975 fs->fsi_flag |= 1; /* FAT32: FSInfo is to be updated */
4976 }
4977 }
4978 }
4979
4980 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4981}
4982
4983/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4984/* Truncate File */
4985/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
4986
4987FRESULT f_truncate(
4988 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
4989) {
4990 FRESULT res;
4991 FATFS* fs;
4992 DWORD ncl;
4993
4994 res = validate(&fp->obj, &fs); /* Check validity of the file object */
4995 if (res != FR_OK || (res = (FRESULT)fp->err) != FR_OK)
4996 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
4997 if (!(fp->flag & FA_WRITE))
4998 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_DENIED); /* Check access mode */
4999
5000 if (fp->fptr < fp->obj.objsize) { /* Process when fptr is not on the eof */
5001 if (fp->fptr == 0) { /* When set file size to zero, remove entire cluster chain */
5002 res = remove_chain(&fp->obj, fp->obj.sclust, 0);
5003 fp->obj.sclust = 0;
5004 } else { /* When truncate a part of the file, remove remaining clusters */
5005 ncl = get_fat(&fp->obj, fp->clust);
5006 res = FR_OK;
5007 if (ncl == 0xFFFFFFFF)
5008 res = FR_DISK_ERR;
5009 if (ncl == 1)
5010 res = FR_INT_ERR;
5011 if (res == FR_OK && ncl < fs->n_fatent) {
5012 res = remove_chain(&fp->obj, ncl, fp->clust);
5013 }
5014 }
5015 fp->obj.objsize = fp->fptr; /* Set file size to current read/write point */
5016 fp->flag |= FA_MODIFIED;
5017#if !FF_FS_TINY
5018 if (res == FR_OK && (fp->flag & FA_DIRTY)) {
5019 if (disk_write(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, fp->sect, 1) != RES_OK) {
5020 res = FR_DISK_ERR;
5021 } else {
5022 fp->flag &= (BYTE)~FA_DIRTY;
5023 }
5024 }
5025#endif
5026 if (res != FR_OK)
5027 ABORT(fs, res);
5028 }
5029
5030 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5031}
5032
5033/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5034/* Delete a File/Directory */
5035/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5036
5037FRESULT f_unlink(
5038 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the file or directory path */
5039) {
5040 FRESULT res;
5041 FATFS* fs;
5042 DIR dj, sdj;
5043 DWORD dclst = 0;
5044#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5045 FFOBJID obj;
5046#endif
5047 DEF_NAMBUF
5048
5049 /* Get logical drive */
5050 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, FA_WRITE);
5051 if (res == FR_OK) {
5052 dj.obj.fs = fs;
5053 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
5054 res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
5055 if (FF_FS_RPATH && res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NSFLAG] & NS_DOT)) {
5056 res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Cannot remove dot entry */
5057 }
5058#if FF_FS_LOCK
5059 if (res == FR_OK)
5060 res = chk_share(&dj, 2); /* Check if it is an open object */
5061#endif
5062 if (res == FR_OK) { /* The object is accessible */
5063 if (dj.fn[NSFLAG] & NS_NONAME) {
5064 res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Cannot remove the origin directory */
5065 } else {
5066 if (dj.obj.attr & AM_RDO) {
5067 res = FR_DENIED; /* Cannot remove R/O object */
5068 }
5069 }
5070 if (res == FR_OK) {
5071#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5072 obj.fs = fs;
5073 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5074 init_alloc_info(fs, &obj);
5075 dclst = obj.sclust;
5076 } else
5077#endif
5078 {
5079 dclst = ld_clust(fs, dj.dir);
5080 }
5081 if (dj.obj.attr & AM_DIR) { /* Is it a sub-directory? */
5082#if FF_FS_RPATH != 0
5083 if (dclst == fs->cdir) { /* Is it the current directory? */
5084 res = FR_DENIED;
5085 } else
5086#endif
5087 {
5088 sdj.obj.fs = fs; /* Open the sub-directory */
5089 sdj.obj.sclust = dclst;
5090#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5091 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5092 sdj.obj.objsize = obj.objsize;
5093 sdj.obj.stat = obj.stat;
5094 }
5095#endif
5096 res = dir_sdi(&sdj, 0);
5097 if (res == FR_OK) {
5098 res = DIR_READ_FILE(&sdj); /* Test if the directory is empty */
5099 if (res == FR_OK)
5100 res = FR_DENIED; /* Not empty? */
5101 if (res == FR_NO_FILE)
5102 res = FR_OK; /* Empty? */
5103 }
5104 }
5105 }
5106 }
5107 if (res == FR_OK) {
5108 res = dir_remove(&dj); /* Remove the directory entry */
5109 if (res == FR_OK && dclst != 0) { /* Remove the cluster chain if exist */
5110#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5111 res = remove_chain(&obj, dclst, 0);
5112#else
5113 res = remove_chain(&dj.obj, dclst, 0);
5114#endif
5115 }
5116 if (res == FR_OK)
5117 res = sync_fs(fs);
5118 }
5119 }
5120 FREE_NAMBUF();
5121 }
5122
5123 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5124}
5125
5126/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5127/* Create a Directory */
5128/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5129
5130FRESULT f_mkdir(
5131 const TCHAR* path /* Pointer to the directory path */
5132) {
5133 FRESULT res;
5134 FATFS* fs;
5135 DIR dj;
5136 FFOBJID sobj;
5137 DWORD dcl, pcl, tm;
5138 DEF_NAMBUF
5139
5140 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, FA_WRITE); /* Get logical drive */
5141 if (res == FR_OK) {
5142 dj.obj.fs = fs;
5143 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
5144 res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
5145 if (res == FR_OK)
5146 res = FR_EXIST; /* Name collision? */
5147 if (FF_FS_RPATH && res == FR_NO_FILE && (dj.fn[NSFLAG] & NS_DOT)) { /* Invalid name? */
5148 res = FR_INVALID_NAME;
5149 }
5150 if (res == FR_NO_FILE) { /* It is clear to create a new directory */
5151 sobj.fs = fs; /* New object id to create a new chain */
5152 dcl = create_chain(&sobj, 0); /* Allocate a cluster for the new directory */
5153 res = FR_OK;
5154 if (dcl == 0)
5155 res = FR_DENIED; /* No space to allocate a new cluster? */
5156 if (dcl == 1)
5157 res = FR_INT_ERR; /* Any insanity? */
5158 if (dcl == 0xFFFFFFFF)
5159 res = FR_DISK_ERR; /* Disk error? */
5160 tm = GET_FATTIME();
5161 if (res == FR_OK) {
5162 res = dir_clear(fs, dcl); /* Clean up the new table */
5163 if (res == FR_OK) {
5164 if (!FF_FS_EXFAT || fs->fs_type != FS_EXFAT) { /* Create dot entries (FAT only) */
5165 memset(fs->win + DIR_Name, ' ', 11); /* Create "." entry */
5166 fs->win[DIR_Name] = '.';
5167 fs->win[DIR_Attr] = AM_DIR;
5168 st_dword(fs->win + DIR_ModTime, tm);
5169 st_clust(fs, fs->win, dcl);
5170 memcpy(fs->win + SZDIRE, fs->win, SZDIRE); /* Create ".." entry */
5171 fs->win[SZDIRE + 1] = '.';
5172 pcl = dj.obj.sclust;
5173 st_clust(fs, fs->win + SZDIRE, pcl);
5174 fs->wflag = 1;
5175 }
5176 res = dir_register(&dj); /* Register the object to the parent directoy */
5177 }
5178 }
5179 if (res == FR_OK) {
5180#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5181 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) { /* Initialize directory entry block */
5182 st_dword(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_ModTime, tm); /* Created time */
5183 st_dword(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_FstClus, dcl); /* Table start cluster */
5184 st_dword(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_FileSize, (DWORD)fs->csize * SS(fs)); /* Directory size needs to be valid */
5185 st_dword(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_ValidFileSize, (DWORD)fs->csize * SS(fs));
5186 fs->dirbuf[XDIR_GenFlags] = 3; /* Initialize the object flag */
5187 fs->dirbuf[XDIR_Attr] = AM_DIR; /* Attribute */
5188 res = store_xdir(&dj);
5189 } else
5190#endif
5191 {
5192 st_dword(dj.dir + DIR_ModTime, tm); /* Created time */
5193 st_clust(fs, dj.dir, dcl); /* Table start cluster */
5194 dj.dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_DIR; /* Attribute */
5195 fs->wflag = 1;
5196 }
5197 if (res == FR_OK) {
5198 res = sync_fs(fs);
5199 }
5200 } else {
5201 remove_chain(&sobj, dcl, 0); /* Could not register, remove the allocated cluster */
5202 }
5203 }
5204 FREE_NAMBUF();
5205 }
5206
5207 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5208}
5209
5210/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5211/* Rename a File/Directory */
5212/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5213
5214FRESULT f_rename(
5215 const TCHAR* path_old, /* Pointer to the object name to be renamed */
5216 const TCHAR* path_new /* Pointer to the new name */
5217) {
5218 FRESULT res;
5219 FATFS* fs;
5220 DIR djo, djn;
5221 BYTE buf[FF_FS_EXFAT ? SZDIRE * 2 : SZDIRE], *dir;
5222 LBA_t sect;
5223 DEF_NAMBUF
5224
5225 get_ldnumber(&path_new); /* Snip the drive number of new name off */
5226 res = mount_volume(&path_old, &fs, FA_WRITE); /* Get logical drive of the old object */
5227 if (res == FR_OK) {
5228 djo.obj.fs = fs;
5229 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
5230 res = follow_path(&djo, path_old); /* Check old object */
5231 if (res == FR_OK && (djo.fn[NSFLAG] & (NS_DOT | NS_NONAME)))
5232 res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Check validity of name */
5233#if FF_FS_LOCK
5234 if (res == FR_OK) {
5235 res = chk_share(&djo, 2);
5236 }
5237#endif
5238 if (res == FR_OK) { /* Object to be renamed is found */
5239#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5240 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) { /* At exFAT volume */
5241 BYTE nf, nn;
5242 WORD nh;
5243
5244 memcpy(buf, fs->dirbuf, SZDIRE * 2); /* Save 85+C0 entry of old object */
5245 memcpy(&djn, &djo, sizeof djo);
5246 res = follow_path(&djn, path_new); /* Make sure if new object name is not in use */
5247 if (res == FR_OK) { /* Is new name already in use by any other object? */
5248 res = (djn.obj.sclust == djo.obj.sclust && djn.dptr == djo.dptr) ? FR_NO_FILE : FR_EXIST;
5249 }
5250 if (res == FR_NO_FILE) { /* It is a valid path and no name collision */
5251 res = dir_register(&djn); /* Register the new entry */
5252 if (res == FR_OK) {
5253 nf = fs->dirbuf[XDIR_NumSec];
5254 nn = fs->dirbuf[XDIR_NumName];
5255 nh = ld_word(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_NameHash);
5256 memcpy(fs->dirbuf, buf, SZDIRE * 2); /* Restore 85+C0 entry */
5257 fs->dirbuf[XDIR_NumSec] = nf;
5258 fs->dirbuf[XDIR_NumName] = nn;
5259 st_word(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_NameHash, nh);
5260 if (!(fs->dirbuf[XDIR_Attr] & AM_DIR))
5261 fs->dirbuf[XDIR_Attr] |= AM_ARC; /* Set archive attribute if it is a file */
5262 /* Start of critical section where an interruption can cause a cross-link */
5263 res = store_xdir(&djn);
5264 }
5265 }
5266 } else
5267#endif
5268 { /* At FAT/FAT32 volume */
5269 memcpy(buf, djo.dir, SZDIRE); /* Save directory entry of the object */
5270 memcpy(&djn, &djo, sizeof(DIR)); /* Duplicate the directory object */
5271 res = follow_path(&djn, path_new); /* Make sure if new object name is not in use */
5272 if (res == FR_OK) { /* Is new name already in use by any other object? */
5273 res = (djn.obj.sclust == djo.obj.sclust && djn.dptr == djo.dptr) ? FR_NO_FILE : FR_EXIST;
5274 }
5275 if (res == FR_NO_FILE) { /* It is a valid path and no name collision */
5276 res = dir_register(&djn); /* Register the new entry */
5277 if (res == FR_OK) {
5278 dir = djn.dir; /* Copy directory entry of the object except name */
5279 memcpy(dir + 13, buf + 13, SZDIRE - 13);
5280 dir[DIR_Attr] = buf[DIR_Attr];
5281 if (!(dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR))
5282 dir[DIR_Attr] |= AM_ARC; /* Set archive attribute if it is a file */
5283 fs->wflag = 1;
5284 if ((dir[DIR_Attr] & AM_DIR) && djo.obj.sclust != djn.obj.sclust) { /* Update .. entry in the sub-directory if needed */
5285 sect = clst2sect(fs, ld_clust(fs, dir));
5286 if (sect == 0) {
5287 res = FR_INT_ERR;
5288 } else {
5289 /* Start of critical section where an interruption can cause a cross-link */
5290 res = move_window(fs, sect);
5291 dir = fs->win + SZDIRE * 1; /* Ptr to .. entry */
5292 if (res == FR_OK && dir[1] == '.') {
5293 st_clust(fs, dir, djn.obj.sclust);
5294 fs->wflag = 1;
5295 }
5296 }
5297 }
5298 }
5299 }
5300 }
5301 if (res == FR_OK) {
5302 res = dir_remove(&djo); /* Remove old entry */
5303 if (res == FR_OK) {
5304 res = sync_fs(fs);
5305 }
5306 }
5307 /* End of the critical section */
5308 }
5309 FREE_NAMBUF();
5310 }
5311
5312 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5313}
5314
5315#endif /* !FF_FS_READONLY */
5316#endif /* FF_FS_MINIMIZE == 0 */
5317#endif /* FF_FS_MINIMIZE <= 1 */
5318#endif /* FF_FS_MINIMIZE <= 2 */
5319
5320#if FF_USE_CHMOD && !FF_FS_READONLY
5321/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5322/* Change Attribute */
5323/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5324
5325FRESULT f_chmod(
5326 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file path */
5327 BYTE attr, /* Attribute bits */
5328 BYTE mask /* Attribute mask to change */
5329) {
5330 FRESULT res;
5331 FATFS* fs;
5332 DIR dj;
5333 DEF_NAMBUF
5334
5335 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, FA_WRITE); /* Get logical drive */
5336 if (res == FR_OK) {
5337 dj.obj.fs = fs;
5338 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
5339 res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
5340 if (res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NSFLAG] & (NS_DOT | NS_NONAME)))
5341 res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Check object validity */
5342 if (res == FR_OK) {
5343 mask &= AM_RDO | AM_HID | AM_SYS | AM_ARC; /* Valid attribute mask */
5344#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5345 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5346 fs->dirbuf[XDIR_Attr] = (attr & mask) | (fs->dirbuf[XDIR_Attr] & (BYTE)~mask); /* Apply attribute change */
5347 res = store_xdir(&dj);
5348 } else
5349#endif
5350 {
5351 dj.dir[DIR_Attr] = (attr & mask) | (dj.dir[DIR_Attr] & (BYTE)~mask); /* Apply attribute change */
5352 fs->wflag = 1;
5353 }
5354 if (res == FR_OK) {
5355 res = sync_fs(fs);
5356 }
5357 }
5358 FREE_NAMBUF();
5359 }
5360
5361 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5362}
5363
5364/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5365/* Change Timestamp */
5366/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5367
5368FRESULT f_utime(
5369 const TCHAR* path, /* Pointer to the file/directory name */
5370 const FILINFO* fno /* Pointer to the timestamp to be set */
5371) {
5372 FRESULT res;
5373 FATFS* fs;
5374 DIR dj;
5375 DEF_NAMBUF
5376
5377 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, FA_WRITE); /* Get logical drive */
5378 if (res == FR_OK) {
5379 dj.obj.fs = fs;
5380 INIT_NAMBUF(fs);
5381 res = follow_path(&dj, path); /* Follow the file path */
5382 if (res == FR_OK && (dj.fn[NSFLAG] & (NS_DOT | NS_NONAME)))
5383 res = FR_INVALID_NAME; /* Check object validity */
5384 if (res == FR_OK) {
5385#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5386 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5387 st_dword(fs->dirbuf + XDIR_ModTime, (DWORD)fno->fdate << 16 | fno->ftime);
5388 res = store_xdir(&dj);
5389 } else
5390#endif
5391 {
5392 st_dword(dj.dir + DIR_ModTime, (DWORD)fno->fdate << 16 | fno->ftime);
5393 fs->wflag = 1;
5394 }
5395 if (res == FR_OK) {
5396 res = sync_fs(fs);
5397 }
5398 }
5399 FREE_NAMBUF();
5400 }
5401
5402 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5403}
5404
5405#endif /* FF_USE_CHMOD && !FF_FS_READONLY */
5406
5407#if FF_USE_LABEL
5408/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5409/* Get Volume Label */
5410/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5411
5412FRESULT f_getlabel(
5413 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number */
5414 TCHAR* label, /* Buffer to store the volume label */
5415 DWORD* vsn /* Variable to store the volume serial number */
5416) {
5417 FRESULT res;
5418 FATFS* fs;
5419 DIR dj;
5420 UINT si, di;
5421 WCHAR wc;
5422
5423 /* Get logical drive */
5424 res = mount_volume(&path, &fs, 0);
5425
5426 /* Get volume label */
5427 if (res == FR_OK && label) {
5428 dj.obj.fs = fs;
5429 dj.obj.sclust = 0; /* Open root directory */
5430 res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
5431 if (res == FR_OK) {
5432 res = DIR_READ_LABEL(&dj); /* Find a volume label entry */
5433 if (res == FR_OK) {
5434#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5435 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5436 WCHAR hs;
5437 UINT nw;
5438
5439 for (si = di = hs = 0; si < dj.dir[XDIR_NumLabel]; si++) { /* Extract volume label from 83 entry */
5440 wc = ld_word(dj.dir + XDIR_Label + si * 2);
5441 if (hs == 0 && IsSurrogate(wc)) { /* Is the code a surrogate? */
5442 hs = wc;
5443 continue;
5444 }
5445 nw = put_utf((DWORD)hs << 16 | wc, &label[di], 4); /* Store it in API encoding */
5446 if (nw == 0) { /* Encode error? */
5447 di = 0;
5448 break;
5449 }
5450 di += nw;
5451 hs = 0;
5452 }
5453 if (hs != 0)
5454 di = 0; /* Broken surrogate pair? */
5455 label[di] = 0;
5456 } else
5457#endif
5458 {
5459 si = di = 0; /* Extract volume label from AM_VOL entry */
5460 while (si < 11) {
5461 wc = dj.dir[si++];
5462#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE >= 1 /* Unicode output */
5463 if (dbc_1st((BYTE)wc) && si < 11)
5464 wc = wc << 8 | dj.dir[si++]; /* Is it a DBC? */
5465 wc = ff_oem2uni(wc, CODEPAGE); /* Convert it into Unicode */
5466 if (wc == 0) { /* Invalid char in current code page? */
5467 di = 0;
5468 break;
5469 }
5470 di += put_utf(wc, &label[di], 4); /* Store it in Unicode */
5471#else /* ANSI/OEM output */
5472 label[di++] = (TCHAR)wc;
5473#endif
5474 }
5475 do { /* Truncate trailing spaces */
5476 label[di] = 0;
5477 if (di == 0)
5478 break;
5479 } while (label[--di] == ' ');
5480 }
5481 }
5482 }
5483 if (res == FR_NO_FILE) { /* No label entry and return nul string */
5484 label[0] = 0;
5485 res = FR_OK;
5486 }
5487 }
5488
5489 /* Get volume serial number */
5490 if (res == FR_OK && vsn) {
5491 res = move_window(fs, fs->volbase);
5492 if (res == FR_OK) {
5493 switch (fs->fs_type) {
5494 case FS_EXFAT:
5495 di = BPB_VolIDEx;
5496 break;
5497
5498 case FS_FAT32:
5499 di = BS_VolID32;
5500 break;
5501
5502 default:
5503 di = BS_VolID;
5504 }
5505 *vsn = ld_dword(fs->win + di);
5506 }
5507 }
5508
5509 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5510}
5511
5512#if !FF_FS_READONLY
5513/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5514/* Set Volume Label */
5515/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5516
5517FRESULT f_setlabel(
5518 const TCHAR* label /* Volume label to set with heading logical drive number */
5519) {
5520 FRESULT res;
5521 FATFS* fs;
5522 DIR dj;
5523 BYTE dirvn[22];
5524 UINT di;
5525 WCHAR wc;
5526 static const char badchr[18] =
5527 "+.,;=[]"
5528 "/*:<>|\\\"\?\x7F"; /* [0..16] for FAT, [7..16] for exFAT */
5529#if FF_USE_LFN
5530 DWORD dc;
5531#endif
5532
5533 /* Get logical drive */
5534 res = mount_volume(&label, &fs, FA_WRITE);
5535 if (res != FR_OK)
5536 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5537
5538#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5539 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) { /* On the exFAT volume */
5540 memset(dirvn, 0, 22);
5541 di = 0;
5542 while ((UINT)*label >= ' ') { /* Create volume label */
5543 dc = tchar2uni(&label); /* Get a Unicode character */
5544 if (dc >= 0x10000) {
5545 if (dc == 0xFFFFFFFF || di >= 10) { /* Wrong surrogate or buffer overflow */
5546 dc = 0;
5547 } else {
5548 st_word(dirvn + di * 2, (WCHAR)(dc >> 16));
5549 di++;
5550 }
5551 }
5552 if (dc == 0 || strchr(&badchr[7], (int)dc) || di >= 11) { /* Check validity of the volume label */
5553 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_INVALID_NAME);
5554 }
5555 st_word(dirvn + di * 2, (WCHAR)dc);
5556 di++;
5557 }
5558 } else
5559#endif
5560 { /* On the FAT/FAT32 volume */
5561 memset(dirvn, ' ', 11);
5562 di = 0;
5563 while ((UINT)*label >= ' ') { /* Create volume label */
5564#if FF_USE_LFN
5565 dc = tchar2uni(&label);
5566 wc = (dc < 0x10000) ? ff_uni2oem(ff_wtoupper(dc), CODEPAGE) : 0;
5567#else /* ANSI/OEM input */
5568 wc = (BYTE)*label++;
5569 if (dbc_1st((BYTE)wc))
5570 wc = dbc_2nd((BYTE)*label) ? wc << 8 | (BYTE)*label++ : 0;
5571 if (IsLower(wc))
5572 wc -= 0x20; /* To upper ASCII characters */
5573#if FF_CODE_PAGE == 0
5574 if (ExCvt && wc >= 0x80)
5575 wc = ExCvt[wc - 0x80]; /* To upper extended characters (SBCS cfg) */
5576#elif FF_CODE_PAGE < 900
5577 if (wc >= 0x80)
5578 wc = ExCvt[wc - 0x80]; /* To upper extended characters (SBCS cfg) */
5579#endif
5580#endif
5581 if (wc == 0 || strchr(&badchr[0], (int)wc) || di >= (UINT)((wc >= 0x100) ? 10 : 11)) { /* Reject invalid characters for volume label */
5582 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_INVALID_NAME);
5583 }
5584 if (wc >= 0x100)
5585 dirvn[di++] = (BYTE)(wc >> 8);
5586 dirvn[di++] = (BYTE)wc;
5587 }
5588 if (dirvn[0] == DDEM)
5589 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_INVALID_NAME); /* Reject illegal name (heading DDEM) */
5590 while (di && dirvn[di - 1] == ' ')
5591 di--; /* Snip trailing spaces */
5592 }
5593
5594 /* Set volume label */
5595 dj.obj.fs = fs;
5596 dj.obj.sclust = 0; /* Open root directory */
5597 res = dir_sdi(&dj, 0);
5598 if (res == FR_OK) {
5599 res = DIR_READ_LABEL(&dj); /* Get volume label entry */
5600 if (res == FR_OK) {
5601 if (FF_FS_EXFAT && fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5602 dj.dir[XDIR_NumLabel] = (BYTE)di; /* Change the volume label */
5603 memcpy(dj.dir + XDIR_Label, dirvn, 22);
5604 } else {
5605 if (di != 0) {
5606 memcpy(dj.dir, dirvn, 11); /* Change the volume label */
5607 } else {
5608 dj.dir[DIR_Name] = DDEM; /* Remove the volume label */
5609 }
5610 }
5611 fs->wflag = 1;
5612 res = sync_fs(fs);
5613 } else { /* No volume label entry or an error */
5614 if (res == FR_NO_FILE) {
5615 res = FR_OK;
5616 if (di != 0) { /* Create a volume label entry */
5617 res = dir_alloc(&dj, 1); /* Allocate an entry */
5618 if (res == FR_OK) {
5619 memset(dj.dir, 0, SZDIRE); /* Clean the entry */
5620 if (FF_FS_EXFAT && fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5621 dj.dir[XDIR_Type] = ET_VLABEL; /* Create volume label entry */
5622 dj.dir[XDIR_NumLabel] = (BYTE)di;
5623 memcpy(dj.dir + XDIR_Label, dirvn, 22);
5624 } else {
5625 dj.dir[DIR_Attr] = AM_VOL; /* Create volume label entry */
5626 memcpy(dj.dir, dirvn, 11);
5627 }
5628 fs->wflag = 1;
5629 res = sync_fs(fs);
5630 }
5631 }
5632 }
5633 }
5634 }
5635
5636 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5637}
5638
5639#endif /* !FF_FS_READONLY */
5640#endif /* FF_USE_LABEL */
5641
5642#if FF_USE_EXPAND && !FF_FS_READONLY
5643/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5644/* Allocate a Contiguous Blocks to the File */
5645/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5646
5647FRESULT f_expand(
5648 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
5649 FSIZE_t fsz, /* File size to be expanded to */
5650 BYTE opt /* Operation mode 0:Find and prepare or 1:Find and allocate */
5651) {
5652 FRESULT res;
5653 FATFS* fs;
5654 DWORD n, clst, stcl, scl, ncl, tcl, lclst;
5655
5656 res = validate(&fp->obj, &fs); /* Check validity of the file object */
5657 if (res != FR_OK || (res = (FRESULT)fp->err) != FR_OK)
5658 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5659 if (fsz == 0 || fp->obj.objsize != 0 || !(fp->flag & FA_WRITE))
5660 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_DENIED);
5661#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5662 if (fs->fs_type != FS_EXFAT && fsz >= 0x100000000)
5663 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_DENIED); /* Check if in size limit */
5664#endif
5665 n = (DWORD)fs->csize * SS(fs); /* Cluster size */
5666 tcl = (DWORD)(fsz / n) + ((fsz & (n - 1)) ? 1 : 0); /* Number of clusters required */
5667 stcl = fs->last_clst;
5668 lclst = 0;
5669 if (stcl < 2 || stcl >= fs->n_fatent)
5670 stcl = 2;
5671
5672#if FF_FS_EXFAT
5673 if (fs->fs_type == FS_EXFAT) {
5674 scl = find_bitmap(fs, stcl, tcl); /* Find a contiguous cluster block */
5675 if (scl == 0)
5676 res = FR_DENIED; /* No contiguous cluster block was found */
5677 if (scl == 0xFFFFFFFF)
5678 res = FR_DISK_ERR;
5679 if (res == FR_OK) { /* A contiguous free area is found */
5680 if (opt) { /* Allocate it now */
5681 res = change_bitmap(fs, scl, tcl, 1); /* Mark the cluster block 'in use' */
5682 lclst = scl + tcl - 1;
5683 } else { /* Set it as suggested point for next allocation */
5684 lclst = scl - 1;
5685 }
5686 }
5687 } else
5688#endif
5689 {
5690 scl = clst = stcl;
5691 ncl = 0;
5692 for (;;) { /* Find a contiguous cluster block */
5693 n = get_fat(&fp->obj, clst);
5694 if (++clst >= fs->n_fatent)
5695 clst = 2;
5696 if (n == 1) {
5697 res = FR_INT_ERR;
5698 break;
5699 }
5700 if (n == 0xFFFFFFFF) {
5701 res = FR_DISK_ERR;
5702 break;
5703 }
5704 if (n == 0) { /* Is it a free cluster? */
5705 if (++ncl == tcl)
5706 break; /* Break if a contiguous cluster block is found */
5707 } else {
5708 scl = clst;
5709 ncl = 0; /* Not a free cluster */
5710 }
5711 if (clst == stcl) { /* No contiguous cluster? */
5712 res = FR_DENIED;
5713 break;
5714 }
5715 }
5716 if (res == FR_OK) { /* A contiguous free area is found */
5717 if (opt) { /* Allocate it now */
5718 for (clst = scl, n = tcl; n; clst++, n--) { /* Create a cluster chain on the FAT */
5719 res = put_fat(fs, clst, (n == 1) ? 0xFFFFFFFF : clst + 1);
5720 if (res != FR_OK)
5721 break;
5722 lclst = clst;
5723 }
5724 } else { /* Set it as suggested point for next allocation */
5725 lclst = scl - 1;
5726 }
5727 }
5728 }
5729
5730 if (res == FR_OK) {
5731 fs->last_clst = lclst; /* Set suggested start cluster to start next */
5732 if (opt) { /* Is it allocated now? */
5733 fp->obj.sclust = scl; /* Update object allocation information */
5734 fp->obj.objsize = fsz;
5735 if (FF_FS_EXFAT)
5736 fp->obj.stat = 2; /* Set status 'contiguous chain' */
5737 fp->flag |= FA_MODIFIED;
5738 if (fs->free_clst <= fs->n_fatent - 2) { /* Update FSINFO */
5739 fs->free_clst -= tcl;
5740 fs->fsi_flag |= 1;
5741 }
5742 }
5743 }
5744
5745 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5746}
5747
5748#endif /* FF_USE_EXPAND && !FF_FS_READONLY */
5749
5750#if FF_USE_FORWARD
5751/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5752/* Forward Data to the Stream Directly */
5753/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5754
5755FRESULT f_forward(
5756 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
5757 UINT (*func)(const BYTE*, UINT), /* Pointer to the streaming function */
5758 UINT btf, /* Number of bytes to forward */
5759 UINT* bf /* Pointer to number of bytes forwarded */
5760) {
5761 FRESULT res;
5762 FATFS* fs;
5763 DWORD clst;
5764 LBA_t sect;
5765 FSIZE_t remain;
5766 UINT rcnt, csect;
5767 BYTE* dbuf;
5768
5769 *bf = 0; /* Clear transfer byte counter */
5770 res = validate(&fp->obj, &fs); /* Check validity of the file object */
5771 if (res != FR_OK || (res = (FRESULT)fp->err) != FR_OK)
5772 LEAVE_FF(fs, res);
5773 if (!(fp->flag & FA_READ))
5774 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_DENIED); /* Check access mode */
5775
5776 remain = fp->obj.objsize - fp->fptr;
5777 if (btf > remain)
5778 btf = (UINT)remain; /* Truncate btf by remaining bytes */
5779
5780 for (; btf > 0 && (*func)(0, 0); fp->fptr += rcnt, *bf += rcnt, btf -= rcnt) { /* Repeat until all data transferred or stream goes busy */
5781 csect = (UINT)(fp->fptr / SS(fs) & (fs->csize - 1)); /* Sector offset in the cluster */
5782 if (fp->fptr % SS(fs) == 0) { /* On the sector boundary? */
5783 if (csect == 0) { /* On the cluster boundary? */
5784 clst = (fp->fptr == 0) ? /* On the top of the file? */
5785 fp->obj.sclust
5786 : get_fat(&fp->obj, fp->clust);
5787 if (clst <= 1)
5788 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
5789 if (clst == 0xFFFFFFFF)
5790 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
5791 fp->clust = clst; /* Update current cluster */
5792 }
5793 }
5794 sect = clst2sect(fs, fp->clust); /* Get current data sector */
5795 if (sect == 0)
5796 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
5797 sect += csect;
5798#if FF_FS_TINY
5799 if (move_window(fs, sect) != FR_OK)
5800 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR); /* Move sector window to the file data */
5801 dbuf = fs->win;
5802#else
5803 if (fp->sect != sect) { /* Fill sector cache with file data */
5804#if !FF_FS_READONLY
5805 if (fp->flag & FA_DIRTY) { /* Write-back dirty sector cache */
5806 if (disk_write(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, fp->sect, 1) != RES_OK)
5807 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
5808 fp->flag &= (BYTE)~FA_DIRTY;
5809 }
5810#endif
5811 if (disk_read(fs->pdrv, fp->buf, sect, 1) != RES_OK)
5812 ABORT(fs, FR_DISK_ERR);
5813 }
5814 dbuf = fp->buf;
5815#endif
5816 fp->sect = sect;
5817 rcnt = SS(fs) - (UINT)fp->fptr % SS(fs); /* Number of bytes remains in the sector */
5818 if (rcnt > btf)
5819 rcnt = btf; /* Clip it by btr if needed */
5820 rcnt = (*func)(dbuf + ((UINT)fp->fptr % SS(fs)), rcnt); /* Forward the file data */
5821 if (rcnt == 0)
5822 ABORT(fs, FR_INT_ERR);
5823 }
5824
5825 LEAVE_FF(fs, FR_OK);
5826}
5827#endif /* FF_USE_FORWARD */
5828
5829#if !FF_FS_READONLY && FF_USE_MKFS
5830/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5831/* Create FAT/exFAT volume (with sub-functions) */
5832/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
5833
5834#define N_SEC_TRACK 63 /* Sectors per track for determination of drive CHS */
5835#define GPT_ALIGN 0x100000 /* Alignment of partitions in GPT [byte] (>=128KB) */
5836#define GPT_ITEMS 128 /* Number of GPT table size (>=128, sector aligned) */
5837
5838/* Create partitions on the physical drive in format of MBR or GPT */
5839
5840static FRESULT create_partition(
5841 BYTE drv, /* Physical drive number */
5842 const LBA_t plst[], /* Partition list */
5843 BYTE sys, /* System ID for each partition (for only MBR) */
5844 BYTE* buf /* Working buffer for a sector */
5845) {
5846 UINT i, cy;
5847 LBA_t sz_drv;
5848 DWORD sz_drv32, nxt_alloc32, sz_part32;
5849 BYTE* pte;
5850 BYTE hd, n_hd, sc, n_sc;
5851
5852 /* Get physical drive size */
5853 if (disk_ioctl(drv, GET_SECTOR_COUNT, &sz_drv) != RES_OK)
5854 return FR_DISK_ERR;
5855
5856#if FF_LBA64
5857 if (sz_drv >= FF_MIN_GPT) { /* Create partitions in GPT format */
5858 WORD ss;
5859 UINT sz_ptbl, pi, si, ofs;
5860 DWORD bcc, rnd, align;
5861 QWORD nxt_alloc, sz_part, sz_pool, top_bpt;
5862 static const BYTE gpt_mbr[16] = {0x00, 0x00, 0x02, 0x00, 0xEE, 0xFE, 0xFF, 0x00, 0x01, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF};
5863
5864#if FF_MAX_SS != FF_MIN_SS
5865 if (disk_ioctl(drv, GET_SECTOR_SIZE, &ss) != RES_OK)
5866 return FR_DISK_ERR; /* Get sector size */
5867 if (ss > FF_MAX_SS || ss < FF_MIN_SS || (ss & (ss - 1)))
5868 return FR_DISK_ERR;
5869#else
5870 ss = FF_MAX_SS;
5871#endif
5872 rnd = (DWORD)sz_drv + GET_FATTIME(); /* Random seed */
5873 align = GPT_ALIGN / ss; /* Partition alignment for GPT [sector] */
5874 sz_ptbl = GPT_ITEMS * SZ_GPTE / ss; /* Size of partition table [sector] */
5875 top_bpt = sz_drv - sz_ptbl - 1; /* Backup partition table start sector */
5876 nxt_alloc = 2 + sz_ptbl; /* First allocatable sector */
5877 sz_pool = top_bpt - nxt_alloc; /* Size of allocatable area */
5878 bcc = 0xFFFFFFFF;
5879 sz_part = 1;
5880 pi = si = 0; /* partition table index, size table index */
5881 do {
5882 if (pi * SZ_GPTE % ss == 0)
5883 memset(buf, 0, ss); /* Clean the buffer if needed */
5884 if (sz_part != 0) { /* Is the size table not termintated? */
5885 nxt_alloc = (nxt_alloc + align - 1) & ((QWORD)0 - align); /* Align partition start */
5886 sz_part = plst[si++]; /* Get a partition size */
5887 if (sz_part <= 100) { /* Is the size in percentage? */
5888 sz_part = sz_pool * sz_part / 100;
5889 sz_part = (sz_part + align - 1) & ((QWORD)0 - align); /* Align partition end (only if in percentage) */
5890 }
5891 if (nxt_alloc + sz_part > top_bpt) { /* Clip the size at end of the pool */
5892 sz_part = (nxt_alloc < top_bpt) ? top_bpt - nxt_alloc : 0;
5893 }
5894 }
5895 if (sz_part != 0) { /* Add a partition? */
5896 ofs = pi * SZ_GPTE % ss;
5897 memcpy(buf + ofs + GPTE_PtGuid, GUID_MS_Basic, 16); /* Set partition GUID (Microsoft Basic Data) */
5898 rnd = make_rand(rnd, buf + ofs + GPTE_UpGuid, 16); /* Set unique partition GUID */
5899 st_qword(buf + ofs + GPTE_FstLba, nxt_alloc); /* Set partition start sector */
5900 st_qword(buf + ofs + GPTE_LstLba, nxt_alloc + sz_part - 1); /* Set partition end sector */
5901 nxt_alloc += sz_part; /* Next allocatable sector */
5902 }
5903 if ((pi + 1) * SZ_GPTE % ss == 0) { /* Write the buffer if it is filled up */
5904 for (i = 0; i < ss; bcc = crc32(bcc, buf[i++]))
5905 ; /* Calculate table check sum */
5906 if (disk_write(drv, buf, 2 + pi * SZ_GPTE / ss, 1) != RES_OK)
5907 return FR_DISK_ERR; /* Write to primary table */
5908 if (disk_write(drv, buf, top_bpt + pi * SZ_GPTE / ss, 1) != RES_OK)
5909 return FR_DISK_ERR; /* Write to secondary table */
5910 }
5911 } while (++pi < GPT_ITEMS);
5912
5913 /* Create primary GPT header */
5914 memset(buf, 0, ss);
5915 memcpy(buf + GPTH_Sign,
5916 "EFI PART"
5917 "\0\0\1\0"
5918 "\x5C\0\0",
5919 16); /* Signature, version (1.0) and size (92) */
5920 st_dword(buf + GPTH_PtBcc, ~bcc); /* Table check sum */
5921 st_qword(buf + GPTH_CurLba, 1); /* LBA of this header */
5922 st_qword(buf + GPTH_BakLba, sz_drv - 1); /* LBA of secondary header */
5923 st_qword(buf + GPTH_FstLba, 2 + sz_ptbl); /* LBA of first allocatable sector */
5924 st_qword(buf + GPTH_LstLba, top_bpt - 1); /* LBA of last allocatable sector */
5925 st_dword(buf + GPTH_PteSize, SZ_GPTE); /* Size of a table entry */
5926 st_dword(buf + GPTH_PtNum, GPT_ITEMS); /* Number of table entries */
5927 st_dword(buf + GPTH_PtOfs, 2); /* LBA of this table */
5928 rnd = make_rand(rnd, buf + GPTH_DskGuid, 16); /* Disk GUID */
5929 for (i = 0, bcc = 0xFFFFFFFF; i < 92; bcc = crc32(bcc, buf[i++]))
5930 ; /* Calculate header check sum */
5931 st_dword(buf + GPTH_Bcc, ~bcc); /* Header check sum */
5932 if (disk_write(drv, buf, 1, 1) != RES_OK)
5933 return FR_DISK_ERR;
5934
5935 /* Create secondary GPT header */
5936 st_qword(buf + GPTH_CurLba, sz_drv - 1); /* LBA of this header */
5937 st_qword(buf + GPTH_BakLba, 1); /* LBA of primary header */
5938 st_qword(buf + GPTH_PtOfs, top_bpt); /* LBA of this table */
5939 st_dword(buf + GPTH_Bcc, 0);
5940 for (i = 0, bcc = 0xFFFFFFFF; i < 92; bcc = crc32(bcc, buf[i++]))
5941 ; /* Calculate header check sum */
5942 st_dword(buf + GPTH_Bcc, ~bcc); /* Header check sum */
5943 if (disk_write(drv, buf, sz_drv - 1, 1) != RES_OK)
5944 return FR_DISK_ERR;
5945
5946 /* Create protective MBR */
5947 memset(buf, 0, ss);
5948 memcpy(buf + MBR_Table, gpt_mbr, 16); /* Create a GPT partition */
5949 st_word(buf + BS_55AA, 0xAA55);
5950 if (disk_write(drv, buf, 0, 1) != RES_OK)
5951 return FR_DISK_ERR;
5952
5953 } else
5954#endif
5955 { /* Create partitions in MBR format */
5956 sz_drv32 = (DWORD)sz_drv;
5957 n_sc = N_SEC_TRACK; /* Determine drive CHS without any consideration of the drive geometry */
5958 for (n_hd = 8; n_hd != 0 && sz_drv32 / n_hd / n_sc > 1024; n_hd *= 2)
5959 ;
5960 if (n_hd == 0)
5961 n_hd = 255; /* Number of heads needs to be <256 */
5962
5963 memset(buf, 0, FF_MAX_SS); /* Clear MBR */
5964 pte = buf + MBR_Table; /* Partition table in the MBR */
5965 for (i = 0, nxt_alloc32 = n_sc; i < 4 && nxt_alloc32 != 0 && nxt_alloc32 < sz_drv32; i++, nxt_alloc32 += sz_part32) {
5966 sz_part32 = (DWORD)plst[i]; /* Get partition size */
5967 if (sz_part32 <= 100)
5968 sz_part32 = (sz_part32 == 100) ? sz_drv32 : sz_drv32 / 100 * sz_part32; /* Size in percentage? */
5969 if (nxt_alloc32 + sz_part32 > sz_drv32 || nxt_alloc32 + sz_part32 < nxt_alloc32)
5970 sz_part32 = sz_drv32 - nxt_alloc32; /* Clip at drive size */
5971 if (sz_part32 == 0)
5972 break; /* End of table or no sector to allocate? */
5973
5974 st_dword(pte + PTE_StLba, nxt_alloc32); /* Start LBA */
5975 st_dword(pte + PTE_SizLba, sz_part32); /* Number of sectors */
5976 pte[PTE_System] = sys; /* System type */
5977
5978 cy = (UINT)(nxt_alloc32 / n_sc / n_hd); /* Start cylinder */
5979 hd = (BYTE)(nxt_alloc32 / n_sc % n_hd); /* Start head */
5980 sc = (BYTE)(nxt_alloc32 % n_sc + 1); /* Start sector */
5981 pte[PTE_StHead] = hd;
5982 pte[PTE_StSec] = (BYTE)((cy >> 2 & 0xC0) | sc);
5983 pte[PTE_StCyl] = (BYTE)cy;
5984
5985 cy = (UINT)((nxt_alloc32 + sz_part32 - 1) / n_sc / n_hd); /* End cylinder */
5986 hd = (BYTE)((nxt_alloc32 + sz_part32 - 1) / n_sc % n_hd); /* End head */
5987 sc = (BYTE)((nxt_alloc32 + sz_part32 - 1) % n_sc + 1); /* End sector */
5988 pte[PTE_EdHead] = hd;
5989 pte[PTE_EdSec] = (BYTE)((cy >> 2 & 0xC0) | sc);
5990 pte[PTE_EdCyl] = (BYTE)cy;
5991
5992 pte += SZ_PTE; /* Next entry */
5993 }
5994
5995 st_word(buf + BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* MBR signature */
5996 if (disk_write(drv, buf, 0, 1) != RES_OK)
5997 return FR_DISK_ERR; /* Write it to the MBR */
5998 }
5999
6000 return FR_OK;
6001}
6002
6003FRESULT f_mkfs(
6004 const TCHAR* path, /* Logical drive number */
6005 const MKFS_PARM* opt, /* Format options */
6006 void* work, /* Pointer to working buffer (null: use len bytes of heap memory) */
6007 UINT len /* Size of working buffer [byte] */
6008) {
6009 static const WORD cst[] = {1, 4, 16, 64, 256, 512, 0}; /* Cluster size boundary for FAT volume (4Ks unit) */
6010 static const WORD cst32[] = {1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 0}; /* Cluster size boundary for FAT32 volume (128Ks unit) */
6011 static const MKFS_PARM defopt = {FM_ANY, 0, 0, 0, 0}; /* Default parameter */
6012 BYTE fsopt, fsty, sys, pdrv, ipart;
6013 BYTE* buf;
6014 BYTE* pte;
6015 WORD ss; /* Sector size */
6016 DWORD sz_buf, sz_blk, n_clst, pau, nsect, n, vsn;
6017 LBA_t sz_vol, b_vol, b_fat, b_data; /* Size of volume, Base LBA of volume, fat, data */
6018 LBA_t sect, lba[2];
6019 DWORD sz_rsv, sz_fat, sz_dir, sz_au; /* Size of reserved, fat, dir, data, cluster */
6020 UINT n_fat, n_root, i; /* Index, Number of FATs and Number of roor dir entries */
6021 int vol;
6022 DSTATUS ds;
6023 FRESULT res;
6024
6025 /* Check mounted drive and clear work area */
6026 vol = get_ldnumber(&path); /* Get target logical drive */
6027 if (vol < 0)
6028 return FR_INVALID_DRIVE;
6029 if (FatFs[vol])
6030 FatFs[vol]->fs_type = 0; /* Clear the fs object if mounted */
6031 pdrv = LD2PD(vol); /* Hosting physical drive */
6032 ipart = LD2PT(vol); /* Hosting partition (0:create as new, 1..:existing partition) */
6033
6034 /* Initialize the hosting physical drive */
6035 ds = disk_initialize(pdrv);
6036 if (ds & STA_NOINIT)
6037 return FR_NOT_READY;
6038 if (ds & STA_PROTECT)
6039 return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
6040
6041 /* Get physical drive parameters (sz_drv, sz_blk and ss) */
6042 if (!opt)
6043 opt = &defopt; /* Use default parameter if it is not given */
6044 sz_blk = opt->align;
6045 if (sz_blk == 0)
6046 disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_BLOCK_SIZE, &sz_blk); /* Block size from the paramter or lower layer */
6047 if (sz_blk == 0 || sz_blk > 0x8000 || (sz_blk & (sz_blk - 1)))
6048 sz_blk = 1; /* Use default if the block size is invalid */
6049#if FF_MAX_SS != FF_MIN_SS
6050 if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_SIZE, &ss) != RES_OK)
6051 return FR_DISK_ERR;
6052 if (ss > FF_MAX_SS || ss < FF_MIN_SS || (ss & (ss - 1)))
6053 return FR_DISK_ERR;
6054#else
6055 ss = FF_MAX_SS;
6056#endif
6057
6058 /* Options for FAT sub-type and FAT parameters */
6059 fsopt = opt->fmt & (FM_ANY | FM_SFD);
6060 n_fat = (opt->n_fat >= 1 && opt->n_fat <= 2) ? opt->n_fat : 1;
6061 n_root = (opt->n_root >= 1 && opt->n_root <= 32768 && (opt->n_root % (ss / SZDIRE)) == 0) ? opt->n_root : 512;
6062 sz_au = (opt->au_size <= 0x1000000 && (opt->au_size & (opt->au_size - 1)) == 0) ? opt->au_size : 0;
6063 sz_au /= ss; /* Byte --> Sector */
6064
6065 /* Get working buffer */
6066 sz_buf = len / ss; /* Size of working buffer [sector] */
6067 if (sz_buf == 0)
6068 return FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE;
6069 buf = (BYTE*)work; /* Working buffer */
6070#if FF_USE_LFN == 3
6071 if (!buf)
6072 buf = ff_memalloc(sz_buf * ss); /* Use heap memory for working buffer */
6073#endif
6074 if (!buf)
6075 return FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE;
6076
6077 /* Determine where the volume to be located (b_vol, sz_vol) */
6078 b_vol = sz_vol = 0;
6079 if (FF_MULTI_PARTITION && ipart != 0) { /* Is the volume associated with any specific partition? */
6080 /* Get partition location from the existing partition table */
6081 if (disk_read(pdrv, buf, 0, 1) != RES_OK)
6082 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR); /* Load MBR */
6083 if (ld_word(buf + BS_55AA) != 0xAA55)
6084 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Check if MBR is valid */
6085#if FF_LBA64
6086 if (buf[MBR_Table + PTE_System] == 0xEE) { /* GPT protective MBR? */
6087 DWORD n_ent, ofs;
6088 QWORD pt_lba;
6089
6090 /* Get the partition location from GPT */
6091 if (disk_read(pdrv, buf, 1, 1) != RES_OK)
6092 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR); /* Load GPT header sector (next to MBR) */
6093 if (!test_gpt_header(buf))
6094 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Check if GPT header is valid */
6095 n_ent = ld_dword(buf + GPTH_PtNum); /* Number of entries */
6096 pt_lba = ld_qword(buf + GPTH_PtOfs); /* Table start sector */
6097 ofs = i = 0;
6098 while (n_ent) { /* Find MS Basic partition with order of ipart */
6099 if (ofs == 0 && disk_read(pdrv, buf, pt_lba++, 1) != RES_OK)
6100 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR); /* Get PT sector */
6101 if (!memcmp(buf + ofs + GPTE_PtGuid, GUID_MS_Basic, 16) && ++i == ipart) { /* MS basic data partition? */
6102 b_vol = ld_qword(buf + ofs + GPTE_FstLba);
6103 sz_vol = ld_qword(buf + ofs + GPTE_LstLba) - b_vol + 1;
6104 break;
6105 }
6106 n_ent--;
6107 ofs = (ofs + SZ_GPTE) % ss; /* Next entry */
6108 }
6109 if (n_ent == 0)
6110 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Partition not found */
6111 fsopt |= 0x80; /* Partitioning is in GPT */
6112 } else
6113#endif
6114 { /* Get the partition location from MBR partition table */
6115 pte = buf + (MBR_Table + (ipart - 1) * SZ_PTE);
6116 if (ipart > 4 || pte[PTE_System] == 0)
6117 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* No partition? */
6118 b_vol = ld_dword(pte + PTE_StLba); /* Get volume start sector */
6119 sz_vol = ld_dword(pte + PTE_SizLba); /* Get volume size */
6120 }
6121 } else { /* The volume is associated with a physical drive */
6122 if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, GET_SECTOR_COUNT, &sz_vol) != RES_OK)
6123 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6124 if (!(fsopt & FM_SFD)) { /* To be partitioned? */
6125 /* Create a single-partition on the drive in this function */
6126#if FF_LBA64
6127 if (sz_vol >= FF_MIN_GPT) { /* Which partition type to create, MBR or GPT? */
6128 fsopt |= 0x80; /* Partitioning is in GPT */
6129 b_vol = GPT_ALIGN / ss;
6130 sz_vol -= b_vol + GPT_ITEMS * SZ_GPTE / ss + 1; /* Estimated partition offset and size */
6131 } else
6132#endif
6133 { /* Partitioning is in MBR */
6134 if (sz_vol > N_SEC_TRACK) {
6135 b_vol = N_SEC_TRACK;
6136 sz_vol -= b_vol; /* Estimated partition offset and size */
6137 }
6138 }
6139 }
6140 }
6141 if (sz_vol < 128)
6142 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Check if volume size is >=128s */
6143
6144 /* Now start to create an FAT volume at b_vol and sz_vol */
6145
6146 do { /* Pre-determine the FAT type */
6147 if (FF_FS_EXFAT && (fsopt & FM_EXFAT)) { /* exFAT possible? */
6148 if ((fsopt & FM_ANY) == FM_EXFAT || sz_vol >= 0x4000000 || sz_au > 128) { /* exFAT only, vol >= 64MS or sz_au > 128S ? */
6149 fsty = FS_EXFAT;
6150 break;
6151 }
6152 }
6153#if FF_LBA64
6154 if (sz_vol >= 0x100000000)
6155 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too large volume for FAT/FAT32 */
6156#endif
6157 if (sz_au > 128)
6158 sz_au = 128; /* Invalid AU for FAT/FAT32? */
6159 if (fsopt & FM_FAT32) { /* FAT32 possible? */
6160 if (!(fsopt & FM_FAT)) { /* no-FAT? */
6161 fsty = FS_FAT32;
6162 break;
6163 }
6164 }
6165 if (!(fsopt & FM_FAT))
6166 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_INVALID_PARAMETER); /* no-FAT? */
6167 fsty = FS_FAT16;
6168 } while (0);
6169
6170 vsn = (DWORD)sz_vol + GET_FATTIME(); /* VSN generated from current time and partitiion size */
6171
6172#if FF_FS_EXFAT
6173 if (fsty == FS_EXFAT) { /* Create an exFAT volume */
6174 DWORD szb_bit, szb_case, sum, nbit, clu, clen[3];
6175 WCHAR ch, si;
6176 UINT j, st;
6177
6178 if (sz_vol < 0x1000)
6179 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too small volume for exFAT? */
6180#if FF_USE_TRIM
6181 lba[0] = b_vol;
6182 lba[1] = b_vol + sz_vol - 1; /* Inform storage device that the volume area may be erased */
6183 disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_TRIM, lba);
6184#endif
6185 /* Determine FAT location, data location and number of clusters */
6186 if (sz_au == 0) { /* AU auto-selection */
6187 sz_au = 8;
6188 if (sz_vol >= 0x80000)
6189 sz_au = 64; /* >= 512Ks */
6190 if (sz_vol >= 0x4000000)
6191 sz_au = 256; /* >= 64Ms */
6192 }
6193 b_fat = b_vol + 32; /* FAT start at offset 32 */
6194 sz_fat = (DWORD)((sz_vol / sz_au + 2) * 4 + ss - 1) / ss; /* Number of FAT sectors */
6195 b_data = (b_fat + sz_fat + sz_blk - 1) & ~((LBA_t)sz_blk - 1); /* Align data area to the erase block boundary */
6196 if (b_data - b_vol >= sz_vol / 2)
6197 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too small volume? */
6198 n_clst = (DWORD)((sz_vol - (b_data - b_vol)) / sz_au); /* Number of clusters */
6199 if (n_clst < 16)
6200 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too few clusters? */
6201 if (n_clst > MAX_EXFAT)
6202 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too many clusters? */
6203
6204 szb_bit = (n_clst + 7) / 8; /* Size of allocation bitmap */
6205 clen[0] = (szb_bit + sz_au * ss - 1) / (sz_au * ss); /* Number of allocation bitmap clusters */
6206
6207 /* Create a compressed up-case table */
6208 sect = b_data + sz_au * clen[0]; /* Table start sector */
6209 sum = 0; /* Table checksum to be stored in the 82 entry */
6210 st = 0;
6211 si = 0;
6212 i = 0;
6213 j = 0;
6214 szb_case = 0;
6215 do {
6216 switch (st) {
6217 case 0:
6218 ch = (WCHAR)ff_wtoupper(si); /* Get an up-case char */
6219 if (ch != si) {
6220 si++;
6221 break; /* Store the up-case char if exist */
6222 }
6223 for (j = 1; (WCHAR)(si + j) && (WCHAR)(si + j) == ff_wtoupper((WCHAR)(si + j)); j++)
6224 ; /* Get run length of no-case block */
6225 if (j >= 128) {
6226 ch = 0xFFFF;
6227 st = 2;
6228 break; /* Compress the no-case block if run is >= 128 chars */
6229 }
6230 st = 1; /* Do not compress short run */
6231 /* FALLTHROUGH */
6232 case 1:
6233 ch = si++; /* Fill the short run */
6234 if (--j == 0)
6235 st = 0;
6236 break;
6237
6238 default:
6239 ch = (WCHAR)j;
6240 si += (WCHAR)j; /* Number of chars to skip */
6241 st = 0;
6242 }
6243 sum = xsum32(buf[i + 0] = (BYTE)ch, sum); /* Put it into the write buffer */
6244 sum = xsum32(buf[i + 1] = (BYTE)(ch >> 8), sum);
6245 i += 2;
6246 szb_case += 2;
6247 if (si == 0 || i == sz_buf * ss) { /* Write buffered data when buffer full or end of process */
6248 n = (i + ss - 1) / ss;
6249 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect, n) != RES_OK)
6250 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6251 sect += n;
6252 i = 0;
6253 }
6254 } while (si);
6255 clen[1] = (szb_case + sz_au * ss - 1) / (sz_au * ss); /* Number of up-case table clusters */
6256 clen[2] = 1; /* Number of root dir clusters */
6257
6258 /* Initialize the allocation bitmap */
6259 sect = b_data;
6260 nsect = (szb_bit + ss - 1) / ss; /* Start of bitmap and number of bitmap sectors */
6261 nbit = clen[0] + clen[1] + clen[2]; /* Number of clusters in-use by system (bitmap, up-case and root-dir) */
6262 do {
6263 memset(buf, 0, sz_buf * ss); /* Initialize bitmap buffer */
6264 for (i = 0; nbit != 0 && i / 8 < sz_buf * ss; buf[i / 8] |= 1 << (i % 8), i++, nbit--)
6265 ; /* Mark used clusters */
6266 n = (nsect > sz_buf) ? sz_buf : nsect; /* Write the buffered data */
6267 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect, n) != RES_OK)
6268 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6269 sect += n;
6270 nsect -= n;
6271 } while (nsect);
6272
6273 /* Initialize the FAT */
6274 sect = b_fat;
6275 nsect = sz_fat; /* Start of FAT and number of FAT sectors */
6276 j = nbit = clu = 0;
6277 do {
6278 memset(buf, 0, sz_buf * ss);
6279 i = 0; /* Clear work area and reset write offset */
6280 if (clu == 0) { /* Initialize FAT [0] and FAT[1] */
6281 st_dword(buf + i, 0xFFFFFFF8);
6282 i += 4;
6283 clu++;
6284 st_dword(buf + i, 0xFFFFFFFF);
6285 i += 4;
6286 clu++;
6287 }
6288 do { /* Create chains of bitmap, up-case and root dir */
6289 while (nbit != 0 && i < sz_buf * ss) { /* Create a chain */
6290 st_dword(buf + i, (nbit > 1) ? clu + 1 : 0xFFFFFFFF);
6291 i += 4;
6292 clu++;
6293 nbit--;
6294 }
6295 if (nbit == 0 && j < 3)
6296 nbit = clen[j++]; /* Get next chain length */
6297 } while (nbit != 0 && i < sz_buf * ss);
6298 n = (nsect > sz_buf) ? sz_buf : nsect; /* Write the buffered data */
6299 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect, n) != RES_OK)
6300 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6301 sect += n;
6302 nsect -= n;
6303 } while (nsect);
6304
6305 /* Initialize the root directory */
6306 memset(buf, 0, sz_buf * ss);
6307 buf[SZDIRE * 0 + 0] = ET_VLABEL; /* Volume label entry (no label) */
6308 buf[SZDIRE * 1 + 0] = ET_BITMAP; /* Bitmap entry */
6309 st_dword(buf + SZDIRE * 1 + 20, 2); /* cluster */
6310 st_dword(buf + SZDIRE * 1 + 24, szb_bit); /* size */
6311 buf[SZDIRE * 2 + 0] = ET_UPCASE; /* Up-case table entry */
6312 st_dword(buf + SZDIRE * 2 + 4, sum); /* sum */
6313 st_dword(buf + SZDIRE * 2 + 20, 2 + clen[0]); /* cluster */
6314 st_dword(buf + SZDIRE * 2 + 24, szb_case); /* size */
6315 sect = b_data + sz_au * (clen[0] + clen[1]);
6316 nsect = sz_au; /* Start of the root directory and number of sectors */
6317 do { /* Fill root directory sectors */
6318 n = (nsect > sz_buf) ? sz_buf : nsect;
6319 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect, n) != RES_OK)
6320 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6321 memset(buf, 0, ss); /* Rest of entries are filled with zero */
6322 sect += n;
6323 nsect -= n;
6324 } while (nsect);
6325
6326 /* Create two set of the exFAT VBR blocks */
6327 sect = b_vol;
6328 for (n = 0; n < 2; n++) {
6329 /* Main record (+0) */
6330 memset(buf, 0, ss);
6331 memcpy(buf + BS_JmpBoot,
6332 "\xEB\x76\x90"
6333 "EXFAT ",
6334 11); /* Boot jump code (x86), OEM name */
6335 st_qword(buf + BPB_VolOfsEx, b_vol); /* Volume offset in the physical drive [sector] */
6336 st_qword(buf + BPB_TotSecEx, sz_vol); /* Volume size [sector] */
6337 st_dword(buf + BPB_FatOfsEx, (DWORD)(b_fat - b_vol)); /* FAT offset [sector] */
6338 st_dword(buf + BPB_FatSzEx, sz_fat); /* FAT size [sector] */
6339 st_dword(buf + BPB_DataOfsEx, (DWORD)(b_data - b_vol)); /* Data offset [sector] */
6340 st_dword(buf + BPB_NumClusEx, n_clst); /* Number of clusters */
6341 st_dword(buf + BPB_RootClusEx, 2 + clen[0] + clen[1]); /* Root dir cluster # */
6342 st_dword(buf + BPB_VolIDEx, vsn); /* VSN */
6343 st_word(buf + BPB_FSVerEx, 0x100); /* Filesystem version (1.00) */
6344 for (buf[BPB_BytsPerSecEx] = 0, i = ss; i >>= 1; buf[BPB_BytsPerSecEx]++)
6345 ; /* Log2 of sector size [byte] */
6346 for (buf[BPB_SecPerClusEx] = 0, i = sz_au; i >>= 1; buf[BPB_SecPerClusEx]++)
6347 ; /* Log2 of cluster size [sector] */
6348 buf[BPB_NumFATsEx] = 1; /* Number of FATs */
6349 buf[BPB_DrvNumEx] = 0x80; /* Drive number (for int13) */
6350 st_word(buf + BS_BootCodeEx, 0xFEEB); /* Boot code (x86) */
6351 st_word(buf + BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* Signature (placed here regardless of sector size) */
6352 for (i = sum = 0; i < ss; i++) { /* VBR checksum */
6353 if (i != BPB_VolFlagEx && i != BPB_VolFlagEx + 1 && i != BPB_PercInUseEx)
6354 sum = xsum32(buf[i], sum);
6355 }
6356 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect++, 1) != RES_OK)
6357 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6358 /* Extended bootstrap record (+1..+8) */
6359 memset(buf, 0, ss);
6360 st_word(buf + ss - 2, 0xAA55); /* Signature (placed at end of sector) */
6361 for (j = 1; j < 9; j++) {
6362 for (i = 0; i < ss; sum = xsum32(buf[i++], sum))
6363 ; /* VBR checksum */
6364 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect++, 1) != RES_OK)
6365 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6366 }
6367 /* OEM/Reserved record (+9..+10) */
6368 memset(buf, 0, ss);
6369 for (; j < 11; j++) {
6370 for (i = 0; i < ss; sum = xsum32(buf[i++], sum))
6371 ; /* VBR checksum */
6372 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect++, 1) != RES_OK)
6373 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6374 }
6375 /* Sum record (+11) */
6376 for (i = 0; i < ss; i += 4)
6377 st_dword(buf + i, sum); /* Fill with checksum value */
6378 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect++, 1) != RES_OK)
6379 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6380 }
6381
6382 } else
6383#endif /* FF_FS_EXFAT */
6384 { /* Create an FAT/FAT32 volume */
6385 do {
6386 pau = sz_au;
6387 /* Pre-determine number of clusters and FAT sub-type */
6388 if (fsty == FS_FAT32) { /* FAT32 volume */
6389 if (pau == 0) { /* AU auto-selection */
6390 n = (DWORD)sz_vol / 0x20000; /* Volume size in unit of 128KS */
6391 for (i = 0, pau = 1; cst32[i] && cst32[i] <= n; i++, pau <<= 1)
6392 ; /* Get from table */
6393 }
6394 n_clst = (DWORD)sz_vol / pau; /* Number of clusters */
6395 sz_fat = (n_clst * 4 + 8 + ss - 1) / ss; /* FAT size [sector] */
6396 sz_rsv = 32; /* Number of reserved sectors */
6397 sz_dir = 0; /* No static directory */
6398 if (n_clst <= MAX_FAT16 || n_clst > MAX_FAT32)
6399 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED);
6400 } else { /* FAT volume */
6401 if (pau == 0) { /* au auto-selection */
6402 n = (DWORD)sz_vol / 0x1000; /* Volume size in unit of 4KS */
6403 for (i = 0, pau = 1; cst[i] && cst[i] <= n; i++, pau <<= 1)
6404 ; /* Get from table */
6405 }
6406 n_clst = (DWORD)sz_vol / pau;
6407 if (n_clst > MAX_FAT12) {
6408 n = n_clst * 2 + 4; /* FAT size [byte] */
6409 } else {
6410 fsty = FS_FAT12;
6411 n = (n_clst * 3 + 1) / 2 + 3; /* FAT size [byte] */
6412 }
6413 sz_fat = (n + ss - 1) / ss; /* FAT size [sector] */
6414 sz_rsv = 1; /* Number of reserved sectors */
6415 sz_dir = (DWORD)n_root * SZDIRE / ss; /* Root dir size [sector] */
6416 }
6417 b_fat = b_vol + sz_rsv; /* FAT base */
6418 b_data = b_fat + sz_fat * n_fat + sz_dir; /* Data base */
6419
6420 /* Align data area to erase block boundary (for flash memory media) */
6421 n = (DWORD)(((b_data + sz_blk - 1) & ~(sz_blk - 1)) - b_data); /* Sectors to next nearest from current data base */
6422 if (fsty == FS_FAT32) { /* FAT32: Move FAT */
6423 sz_rsv += n;
6424 b_fat += n;
6425 } else { /* FAT: Expand FAT */
6426 if (n % n_fat) { /* Adjust fractional error if needed */
6427 n--;
6428 sz_rsv++;
6429 b_fat++;
6430 }
6431 sz_fat += n / n_fat;
6432 }
6433
6434 /* Determine number of clusters and final check of validity of the FAT sub-type */
6435 if (sz_vol < b_data + pau * 16 - b_vol)
6436 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too small volume? */
6437 n_clst = ((DWORD)sz_vol - sz_rsv - sz_fat * n_fat - sz_dir) / pau;
6438 if (fsty == FS_FAT32) {
6439 if (n_clst <= MAX_FAT16) { /* Too few clusters for FAT32? */
6440 if (sz_au == 0 && (sz_au = pau / 2) != 0)
6441 continue; /* Adjust cluster size and retry */
6442 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED);
6443 }
6444 }
6445 if (fsty == FS_FAT16) {
6446 if (n_clst > MAX_FAT16) { /* Too many clusters for FAT16 */
6447 if (sz_au == 0 && (pau * 2) <= 64) {
6448 sz_au = pau * 2;
6449 continue; /* Adjust cluster size and retry */
6450 }
6451 if ((fsopt & FM_FAT32)) {
6452 fsty = FS_FAT32;
6453 continue; /* Switch type to FAT32 and retry */
6454 }
6455 if (sz_au == 0 && (sz_au = pau * 2) <= 128)
6456 continue; /* Adjust cluster size and retry */
6457 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED);
6458 }
6459 if (n_clst <= MAX_FAT12) { /* Too few clusters for FAT16 */
6460 if (sz_au == 0 && (sz_au = pau * 2) <= 128)
6461 continue; /* Adjust cluster size and retry */
6462 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED);
6463 }
6464 }
6465 if (fsty == FS_FAT12 && n_clst > MAX_FAT12)
6466 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_MKFS_ABORTED); /* Too many clusters for FAT12 */
6467
6468 /* Ok, it is the valid cluster configuration */
6469 break;
6470 } while (1);
6471
6472#if FF_USE_TRIM
6473 lba[0] = b_vol;
6474 lba[1] = b_vol + sz_vol - 1; /* Inform storage device that the volume area may be erased */
6475 disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_TRIM, lba);
6476#endif
6477 /* Create FAT VBR */
6478 memset(buf, 0, ss);
6479 memcpy(buf + BS_JmpBoot,
6480 "\xEB\xFE\x90"
6481 "MSDOS5.0",
6482 11); /* Boot jump code (x86), OEM name */
6483 st_word(buf + BPB_BytsPerSec, ss); /* Sector size [byte] */
6484 buf[BPB_SecPerClus] = (BYTE)pau; /* Cluster size [sector] */
6485 st_word(buf + BPB_RsvdSecCnt, (WORD)sz_rsv); /* Size of reserved area */
6486 buf[BPB_NumFATs] = (BYTE)n_fat; /* Number of FATs */
6487 st_word(buf + BPB_RootEntCnt, (WORD)((fsty == FS_FAT32) ? 0 : n_root)); /* Number of root directory entries */
6488 if (sz_vol < 0x10000) {
6489 st_word(buf + BPB_TotSec16, (WORD)sz_vol); /* Volume size in 16-bit LBA */
6490 } else {
6491 st_dword(buf + BPB_TotSec32, (DWORD)sz_vol); /* Volume size in 32-bit LBA */
6492 }
6493 buf[BPB_Media] = 0xF8; /* Media descriptor byte */
6494 st_word(buf + BPB_SecPerTrk, 63); /* Number of sectors per track (for int13) */
6495 st_word(buf + BPB_NumHeads, 255); /* Number of heads (for int13) */
6496 st_dword(buf + BPB_HiddSec, (DWORD)b_vol); /* Volume offset in the physical drive [sector] */
6497 if (fsty == FS_FAT32) {
6498 st_dword(buf + BS_VolID32, vsn); /* VSN */
6499 st_dword(buf + BPB_FATSz32, sz_fat); /* FAT size [sector] */
6500 st_dword(buf + BPB_RootClus32, 2); /* Root directory cluster # (2) */
6501 st_word(buf + BPB_FSInfo32, 1); /* Offset of FSINFO sector (VBR + 1) */
6502 st_word(buf + BPB_BkBootSec32, 6); /* Offset of backup VBR (VBR + 6) */
6503 buf[BS_DrvNum32] = 0x80; /* Drive number (for int13) */
6504 buf[BS_BootSig32] = 0x29; /* Extended boot signature */
6505 memcpy(buf + BS_VolLab32,
6506 "NO NAME "
6507 "FAT32 ",
6508 19); /* Volume label, FAT signature */
6509 } else {
6510 st_dword(buf + BS_VolID, vsn); /* VSN */
6511 st_word(buf + BPB_FATSz16, (WORD)sz_fat); /* FAT size [sector] */
6512 buf[BS_DrvNum] = 0x80; /* Drive number (for int13) */
6513 buf[BS_BootSig] = 0x29; /* Extended boot signature */
6514 memcpy(buf + BS_VolLab,
6515 "NO NAME "
6516 "FAT ",
6517 19); /* Volume label, FAT signature */
6518 }
6519 st_word(buf + BS_55AA, 0xAA55); /* Signature (offset is fixed here regardless of sector size) */
6520 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, b_vol, 1) != RES_OK)
6521 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR); /* Write it to the VBR sector */
6522
6523 /* Create FSINFO record if needed */
6524 if (fsty == FS_FAT32) {
6525 disk_write(pdrv, buf, b_vol + 6, 1); /* Write backup VBR (VBR + 6) */
6526 memset(buf, 0, ss);
6527 st_dword(buf + FSI_LeadSig, 0x41615252);
6528 st_dword(buf + FSI_StrucSig, 0x61417272);
6529 st_dword(buf + FSI_Free_Count, n_clst - 1); /* Number of free clusters */
6530 st_dword(buf + FSI_Nxt_Free, 2); /* Last allocated cluster# */
6531 st_word(buf + BS_55AA, 0xAA55);
6532 disk_write(pdrv, buf, b_vol + 7, 1); /* Write backup FSINFO (VBR + 7) */
6533 disk_write(pdrv, buf, b_vol + 1, 1); /* Write original FSINFO (VBR + 1) */
6534 }
6535
6536 /* Initialize FAT area */
6537 memset(buf, 0, sz_buf * ss);
6538 sect = b_fat; /* FAT start sector */
6539 for (i = 0; i < n_fat; i++) { /* Initialize FATs each */
6540 if (fsty == FS_FAT32) {
6541 st_dword(buf + 0, 0xFFFFFFF8); /* FAT[0] */
6542 st_dword(buf + 4, 0xFFFFFFFF); /* FAT[1] */
6543 st_dword(buf + 8, 0x0FFFFFFF); /* FAT[2] (root directory) */
6544 } else {
6545 st_dword(buf + 0, (fsty == FS_FAT12) ? 0xFFFFF8 : 0xFFFFFFF8); /* FAT[0] and FAT[1] */
6546 }
6547 nsect = sz_fat; /* Number of FAT sectors */
6548 do { /* Fill FAT sectors */
6549 n = (nsect > sz_buf) ? sz_buf : nsect;
6550 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect, (UINT)n) != RES_OK)
6551 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6552 memset(buf, 0, ss); /* Rest of FAT all are cleared */
6553 sect += n;
6554 nsect -= n;
6555 } while (nsect);
6556 }
6557
6558 /* Initialize root directory (fill with zero) */
6559 nsect = (fsty == FS_FAT32) ? pau : sz_dir; /* Number of root directory sectors */
6560 do {
6561 n = (nsect > sz_buf) ? sz_buf : nsect;
6562 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, sect, (UINT)n) != RES_OK)
6563 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6564 sect += n;
6565 nsect -= n;
6566 } while (nsect);
6567 }
6568
6569 /* A FAT volume has been created here */
6570
6571 /* Determine system ID in the MBR partition table */
6572 if (FF_FS_EXFAT && fsty == FS_EXFAT) {
6573 sys = 0x07; /* exFAT */
6574 } else if (fsty == FS_FAT32) {
6575 sys = 0x0C; /* FAT32X */
6576 } else if (sz_vol >= 0x10000) {
6577 sys = 0x06; /* FAT12/16 (large) */
6578 } else if (fsty == FS_FAT16) {
6579 sys = 0x04; /* FAT16 */
6580 } else {
6581 sys = 0x01; /* FAT12 */
6582 }
6583
6584 /* Update partition information */
6585 if (FF_MULTI_PARTITION && ipart != 0) { /* Volume is in the existing partition */
6586 if (!FF_LBA64 || !(fsopt & 0x80)) { /* Is the partition in MBR? */
6587 /* Update system ID in the partition table */
6588 if (disk_read(pdrv, buf, 0, 1) != RES_OK)
6589 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR); /* Read the MBR */
6590 buf[MBR_Table + (ipart - 1) * SZ_PTE + PTE_System] = sys; /* Set system ID */
6591 if (disk_write(pdrv, buf, 0, 1) != RES_OK)
6592 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR); /* Write it back to the MBR */
6593 }
6594 } else { /* Volume as a new single partition */
6595 if (!(fsopt & FM_SFD)) { /* Create partition table if not in SFD format */
6596 lba[0] = sz_vol;
6597 lba[1] = 0;
6598 res = create_partition(pdrv, lba, sys, buf);
6599 if (res != FR_OK)
6600 LEAVE_MKFS(res);
6601 }
6602 }
6603
6604 if (disk_ioctl(pdrv, CTRL_SYNC, 0) != RES_OK)
6605 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_DISK_ERR);
6606
6607 LEAVE_MKFS(FR_OK);
6608}
6609
6610#if FF_MULTI_PARTITION
6611/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
6612/* Create Partition Table on the Physical Drive */
6613/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
6614
6615FRESULT f_fdisk(
6616 BYTE pdrv, /* Physical drive number */
6617 const LBA_t ptbl[], /* Pointer to the size table for each partitions */
6618 void* work /* Pointer to the working buffer (null: use heap memory) */
6619) {
6620 BYTE* buf = (BYTE*)work;
6621 DSTATUS stat;
6622 FRESULT res;
6623
6624 /* Initialize the physical drive */
6625 stat = disk_initialize(pdrv);
6626 if (stat & STA_NOINIT)
6627 return FR_NOT_READY;
6628 if (stat & STA_PROTECT)
6629 return FR_WRITE_PROTECTED;
6630
6631#if FF_USE_LFN == 3
6632 if (!buf)
6633 buf = ff_memalloc(FF_MAX_SS); /* Use heap memory for working buffer */
6634#endif
6635 if (!buf)
6636 return FR_NOT_ENOUGH_CORE;
6637
6638 res = create_partition(pdrv, ptbl, 0x07, buf); /* Create partitions (system ID is temporary setting and determined by f_mkfs) */
6639
6640 LEAVE_MKFS(res);
6641}
6642
6643#endif /* FF_MULTI_PARTITION */
6644#endif /* !FF_FS_READONLY && FF_USE_MKFS */
6645
6646#if FF_USE_STRFUNC
6647#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE && (FF_STRF_ENCODE < 0 || FF_STRF_ENCODE > 3)
6648#error Wrong FF_STRF_ENCODE setting
6649#endif
6650/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
6651/* Get a String from the File */
6652/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
6653
6654TCHAR* f_gets(
6655 TCHAR* buff, /* Pointer to the buffer to store read string */
6656 int len, /* Size of string buffer (items) */
6657 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
6658) {
6659 int nc = 0;
6660 TCHAR* p = buff;
6661 BYTE s[4];
6662 UINT rc;
6663 DWORD dc;
6664#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE && FF_STRF_ENCODE <= 2
6665 WCHAR wc;
6666#endif
6667#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE && FF_STRF_ENCODE == 3
6668 UINT ct;
6669#endif
6670
6671#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE /* With code conversion (Unicode API) */
6672 /* Make a room for the character and terminator */
6673 if (FF_LFN_UNICODE == 1)
6674 len -= (FF_STRF_ENCODE == 0) ? 1 : 2;
6675 if (FF_LFN_UNICODE == 2)
6676 len -= (FF_STRF_ENCODE == 0) ? 3 : 4;
6677 if (FF_LFN_UNICODE == 3)
6678 len -= 1;
6679 while (nc < len) {
6680#if FF_STRF_ENCODE == 0 /* Read a character in ANSI/OEM */
6681 f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc); /* Get a code unit */
6682 if (rc != 1)
6683 break; /* EOF? */
6684 wc = s[0];
6685 if (dbc_1st((BYTE)wc)) { /* DBC 1st byte? */
6686 f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc); /* Get 2nd byte */
6687 if (rc != 1 || !dbc_2nd(s[0]))
6688 continue; /* Wrong code? */
6689 wc = wc << 8 | s[0];
6690 }
6691 dc = ff_oem2uni(wc, CODEPAGE); /* Convert ANSI/OEM into Unicode */
6692 if (dc == 0)
6693 continue; /* Conversion error? */
6694#elif FF_STRF_ENCODE == 1 || FF_STRF_ENCODE == 2 /* Read a character in UTF-16LE/BE */
6695 f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc); /* Get a code unit */
6696 if (rc != 2)
6697 break; /* EOF? */
6698 dc = (FF_STRF_ENCODE == 1) ? ld_word(s) : s[0] << 8 | s[1];
6699 if (IsSurrogateL(dc))
6700 continue; /* Broken surrogate pair? */
6701 if (IsSurrogateH(dc)) { /* High surrogate? */
6702 f_read(fp, s, 2, &rc); /* Get low surrogate */
6703 if (rc != 2)
6704 break; /* EOF? */
6705 wc = (FF_STRF_ENCODE == 1) ? ld_word(s) : s[0] << 8 | s[1];
6706 if (!IsSurrogateL(wc))
6707 continue; /* Broken surrogate pair? */
6708 dc = ((dc & 0x3FF) + 0x40) << 10 | (wc & 0x3FF); /* Merge surrogate pair */
6709 }
6710#else /* Read a character in UTF-8 */
6711 f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc); /* Get a code unit */
6712 if (rc != 1)
6713 break; /* EOF? */
6714 dc = s[0];
6715 if (dc >= 0x80) { /* Multi-byte sequence? */
6716 ct = 0;
6717 if ((dc & 0xE0) == 0xC0) { /* 2-byte sequence? */
6718 dc &= 0x1F;
6719 ct = 1;
6720 }
6721 if ((dc & 0xF0) == 0xE0) { /* 3-byte sequence? */
6722 dc &= 0x0F;
