6723 ct = 2;
6724 }
6725 if ((dc & 0xF8) == 0xF0) { /* 4-byte sequence? */
6726 dc &= 0x07;
6727 ct = 3;
6728 }
6729 if (ct == 0)
6730 continue;
6731 f_read(fp, s, ct, &rc); /* Get trailing bytes */
6732 if (rc != ct)
6733 break;
6734 rc = 0;
6735 do { /* Merge the byte sequence */
6736 if ((s[rc] & 0xC0) != 0x80)
6737 break;
6738 dc = dc << 6 | (s[rc] & 0x3F);
6739 } while (++rc < ct);
6740 if (rc != ct || dc < 0x80 || IsSurrogate(dc) || dc >= 0x110000)
6741 continue; /* Wrong encoding? */
6742 }
6743#endif
6744 /* A code point is avaialble in dc to be output */
6745
6746 if (FF_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && dc == '\r')
6747 continue; /* Strip \r off if needed */
6748#if FF_LFN_UNICODE == 1 || FF_LFN_UNICODE == 3 /* Output it in UTF-16/32 encoding */
6749 if (FF_LFN_UNICODE == 1 && dc >= 0x10000) { /* Out of BMP at UTF-16? */
6750 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0xD800 | ((dc >> 10) - 0x40));
6751 nc++; /* Make and output high surrogate */
6752 dc = 0xDC00 | (dc & 0x3FF); /* Make low surrogate */
6753 }
6754 *p++ = (TCHAR)dc;
6755 nc++;
6756 if (dc == '\n')
6757 break; /* End of line? */
6758#elif FF_LFN_UNICODE == 2 /* Output it in UTF-8 encoding */
6759 if (dc < 0x80) { /* Single byte? */
6760 *p++ = (TCHAR)dc;
6761 nc++;
6762 if (dc == '\n')
6763 break; /* End of line? */
6764 } else if (dc < 0x800) { /* 2-byte sequence? */
6765 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0xC0 | (dc >> 6 & 0x1F));
6766 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0x80 | (dc >> 0 & 0x3F));
6767 nc += 2;
6768 } else if (dc < 0x10000) { /* 3-byte sequence? */
6769 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0xE0 | (dc >> 12 & 0x0F));
6770 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0x80 | (dc >> 6 & 0x3F));
6771 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0x80 | (dc >> 0 & 0x3F));
6772 nc += 3;
6773 } else { /* 4-byte sequence */
6774 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0xF0 | (dc >> 18 & 0x07));
6775 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0x80 | (dc >> 12 & 0x3F));
6776 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0x80 | (dc >> 6 & 0x3F));
6777 *p++ = (TCHAR)(0x80 | (dc >> 0 & 0x3F));
6778 nc += 4;
6779 }
6780#endif
6781 }
6782
6783#else /* Byte-by-byte read without any conversion (ANSI/OEM API) */
6784 len -= 1; /* Make a room for the terminator */
6785 while (nc < len) {
6786 f_read(fp, s, 1, &rc); /* Get a byte */
6787 if (rc != 1)
6788 break; /* EOF? */
6789 dc = s[0];
6790 if (FF_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && dc == '\r')
6791 continue;
6792 *p++ = (TCHAR)dc;
6793 nc++;
6794 if (dc == '\n')
6795 break;
6796 }
6797#endif
6798
6799 *p = 0; /* Terminate the string */
6800 return nc ? buff : 0; /* When no data read due to EOF or error, return with error. */
6801}
6802
6803#if !FF_FS_READONLY
6804#include <stdarg.h>
6805#define SZ_PUTC_BUF 64
6806#define SZ_NUM_BUF 32
6807
6808/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
6809/* Put a Character to the File (with sub-functions) */
6810/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
6811
6812/* Output buffer and work area */
6813
6814typedef struct {
6815 FIL* fp; /* Ptr to the writing file */
6816 int idx, nchr; /* Write index of buf[] (-1:error), number of encoding units written */
6817#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE == 1
6818 WCHAR hs;
6819#elif FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE == 2
6820 BYTE bs[4];
6821 UINT wi, ct;
6822#endif
6823 BYTE buf[SZ_PUTC_BUF]; /* Write buffer */
6824} putbuff;
6825
6826/* Buffered file write with code conversion */
6827
6828static void putc_bfd(putbuff* pb, TCHAR c) {
6829 UINT n;
6830 int i, nc;
6831#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE
6832 WCHAR hs, wc;
6833#if FF_LFN_UNICODE == 2
6834 DWORD dc;
6835 const TCHAR* tp;
6836#endif
6837#endif
6838
6839 if (FF_USE_STRFUNC == 2 && c == '\n') { /* LF -> CRLF conversion */
6840 putc_bfd(pb, '\r');
6841 }
6842
6843 i = pb->idx; /* Write index of pb->buf[] */
6844 if (i < 0)
6845 return; /* In write error? */
6846 nc = pb->nchr; /* Write unit counter */
6847
6848#if FF_USE_LFN && FF_LFN_UNICODE
6849#if FF_LFN_UNICODE == 1 /* UTF-16 input */
6850 if (IsSurrogateH(c)) { /* Is this a high-surrogate? */
6851 pb->hs = c;
6852 return; /* Save it for next */
6853 }
6854 hs = pb->hs;
6855 pb->hs = 0;
6856 if (hs != 0) { /* Is there a leading high-surrogate? */
6857 if (!IsSurrogateL(c))
6858 hs = 0; /* Discard high-surrogate if not a surrogate pair */
6859 } else {
6860 if (IsSurrogateL(c))
6861 return; /* Discard stray low-surrogate */
6862 }
6863 wc = c;
6864#elif FF_LFN_UNICODE == 2 /* UTF-8 input */
6865 for (;;) {
6866 if (pb->ct == 0) { /* Out of multi-byte sequence? */
6867 pb->bs[pb->wi = 0] = (BYTE)c; /* Save 1st byte */
6868 if ((BYTE)c < 0x80)
6869 break; /* Single byte code? */
6870 if (((BYTE)c & 0xE0) == 0xC0)
6871 pb->ct = 1; /* 2-byte sequence? */
6872 if (((BYTE)c & 0xF0) == 0xE0)
6873 pb->ct = 2; /* 3-byte sequence? */
6874 if (((BYTE)c & 0xF8) == 0xF0)
6875 pb->ct = 3; /* 4-byte sequence? */
6876 return; /* Wrong leading byte (discard it) */
6877 } else { /* In the multi-byte sequence */
6878 if (((BYTE)c & 0xC0) != 0x80) { /* Broken sequence? */
6879 pb->ct = 0;
6880 continue; /* Discard the sequense */
6881 }
6882 pb->bs[++pb->wi] = (BYTE)c; /* Save the trailing byte */
6883 if (--pb->ct == 0)
6884 break; /* End of the sequence? */
6885 return;
6886 }
6887 }
6888 tp = (const TCHAR*)pb->bs;
6889 dc = tchar2uni(&tp); /* UTF-8 ==> UTF-16 */
6890 if (dc == 0xFFFFFFFF)
6891 return; /* Wrong code? */
6892 hs = (WCHAR)(dc >> 16);
6893 wc = (WCHAR)dc;
6894#elif FF_LFN_UNICODE == 3 /* UTF-32 input */
6895 if (IsSurrogate(c) || c >= 0x110000)
6896 return; /* Discard invalid code */
6897 if (c >= 0x10000) { /* Out of BMP? */
6898 hs = (WCHAR)(0xD800 | ((c >> 10) - 0x40)); /* Make high surrogate */
6899 wc = 0xDC00 | (c & 0x3FF); /* Make low surrogate */
6900 } else {
6901 hs = 0;
6902 wc = (WCHAR)c;
6903 }
6904#endif
6905 /* A code point in UTF-16 is available in hs and wc */
6906
6907#if FF_STRF_ENCODE == 1 /* Write a code point in UTF-16LE */
6908 if (hs != 0) { /* Surrogate pair? */
6909 st_word(&pb->buf[i], hs);
6910 i += 2;
6911 nc++;
6912 }
6913 st_word(&pb->buf[i], wc);
6914 i += 2;
6915#elif FF_STRF_ENCODE == 2 /* Write a code point in UTF-16BE */
6916 if (hs != 0) { /* Surrogate pair? */
6917 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(hs >> 8);
6918 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)hs;
6919 nc++;
6920 }
6921 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(wc >> 8);
6922 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)wc;
6923#elif FF_STRF_ENCODE == 3 /* Write a code point in UTF-8 */
6924 if (hs != 0) { /* 4-byte sequence? */
6925 nc += 3;
6926 hs = (hs & 0x3FF) + 0x40;
6927 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xF0 | hs >> 8);
6928 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (hs >> 2 & 0x3F));
6929 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (hs & 3) << 4 | (wc >> 6 & 0x0F));
6930 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (wc & 0x3F));
6931 } else {
6932 if (wc < 0x80) { /* Single byte? */
6933 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)wc;
6934 } else {
6935 if (wc < 0x800) { /* 2-byte sequence? */
6936 nc += 1;
6937 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xC0 | wc >> 6);
6938 } else { /* 3-byte sequence */
6939 nc += 2;
6940 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0xE0 | wc >> 12);
6941 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (wc >> 6 & 0x3F));
6942 }
6943 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(0x80 | (wc & 0x3F));
6944 }
6945 }
6946#else /* Write a code point in ANSI/OEM */
6947 if (hs != 0)
6948 return;
6949 wc = ff_uni2oem(wc, CODEPAGE); /* UTF-16 ==> ANSI/OEM */
6950 if (wc == 0)
6951 return;
6952 if (wc >= 0x100) {
6953 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)(wc >> 8);
6954 nc++;
6955 }
6956 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)wc;
6957#endif
6958
6959#else /* ANSI/OEM input (without re-encoding) */
6960 pb->buf[i++] = (BYTE)c;
6961#endif
6962
6963 if (i >= (int)(sizeof pb->buf) - 4) { /* Write buffered characters to the file */
6964 f_write(pb->fp, pb->buf, (UINT)i, &n);
6965 i = (n == (UINT)i) ? 0 : -1;
6966 }
6967 pb->idx = i;
6968 pb->nchr = nc + 1;
6969}
6970
6971/* Flush remaining characters in the buffer */
6972
6973static int putc_flush(putbuff* pb) {
6974 UINT nw;
6975
6976 if (pb->idx >= 0 /* Flush buffered characters to the file */
6977 && f_write(pb->fp, pb->buf, (UINT)pb->idx, &nw) == FR_OK
6978 && (UINT)pb->idx == nw)
6979 return pb->nchr;
6980 return -1;
6981}
6982
6983/* Initialize write buffer */
6984
6985static void putc_init(putbuff* pb, FIL* fp) {
6986 memset(pb, 0, sizeof(putbuff));
6987 pb->fp = fp;
6988}
6989
6990int f_putc(
6991 TCHAR c, /* A character to be output */
6992 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
6993) {
6994 putbuff pb;
6995
6996 putc_init(&pb, fp);
6997 putc_bfd(&pb, c); /* Put the character */
6998 return putc_flush(&pb);
6999}
7000
7001/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
7002/* Put a String to the File */
7003/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
7004
7005int f_puts(
7006 const TCHAR* str, /* Pointer to the string to be output */
7007 FIL* fp /* Pointer to the file object */
7008) {
7009 putbuff pb;
7010
7011 putc_init(&pb, fp);
7012 while (*str)
7013 putc_bfd(&pb, *str++); /* Put the string */
7014 return putc_flush(&pb);
7015}
7016
7017/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
7018/* Put a Formatted String to the File (with sub-functions) */
7019/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
7020#if FF_PRINT_FLOAT && FF_INTDEF == 2
7021#include <math.h>
7022
7023static int ilog10(double n) /* Calculate log10(n) in integer output */
7024{
7025 int rv = 0;
7026
7027 while (n >= 10) { /* Decimate digit in right shift */
7028 if (n >= 100000) {
7029 n /= 100000;
7030 rv += 5;
7031 } else {
7032 n /= 10;
7033 rv++;
7034 }
7035 }
7036 while (n < 1) { /* Decimate digit in left shift */
7037 if (n < 0.00001) {
7038 n *= 100000;
7039 rv -= 5;
7040 } else {
7041 n *= 10;
7042 rv--;
7043 }
7044 }
7045 return rv;
7046}
7047
7048static double i10x(int n) /* Calculate 10^n in integer input */
7049{
7050 double rv = 1;
7051
7052 while (n > 0) { /* Left shift */
7053 if (n >= 5) {
7054 rv *= 100000;
7055 n -= 5;
7056 } else {
7057 rv *= 10;
7058 n--;
7059 }
7060 }
7061 while (n < 0) { /* Right shift */
7062 if (n <= -5) {
7063 rv /= 100000;
7064 n += 5;
7065 } else {
7066 rv /= 10;
7067 n++;
7068 }
7069 }
7070 return rv;
7071}
7072
7073static void ftoa(
7074 char* buf, /* Buffer to output the floating point string */
7075 double val, /* Value to output */
7076 int prec, /* Number of fractional digits */
7077 TCHAR fmt /* Notation */
7078) {
7079 int d;
7080 int e = 0, m = 0;
7081 char sign = 0;
7082 double w;
7083 const char* er = 0;
7084 const char ds = FF_PRINT_FLOAT == 2 ? ',' : '.';
7085
7086 if (isnan(val)) { /* Not a number? */
7087 er = "NaN";
7088 } else {
7089 if (prec < 0)
7090 prec = 6; /* Default precision? (6 fractional digits) */
7091 if (val < 0) { /* Negative? */
7092 val = 0 - val;
7093 sign = '-';
7094 } else {
7095 sign = '+';
7096 }
7097 if (isinf(val)) { /* Infinite? */
7098 er = "INF";
7099 } else {
7100 if (fmt == 'f') { /* Decimal notation? */
7101 val += i10x(0 - prec) / 2; /* Round (nearest) */
7102 m = ilog10(val);
7103 if (m < 0)
7104 m = 0;
7105 if (m + prec + 3 >= SZ_NUM_BUF)
7106 er = "OV"; /* Buffer overflow? */
7107 } else { /* E notation */
7108 if (val != 0) { /* Not a true zero? */
7109 val += i10x(ilog10(val) - prec) / 2; /* Round (nearest) */
7110 e = ilog10(val);
7111 if (e > 99 || prec + 7 >= SZ_NUM_BUF) { /* Buffer overflow or E > +99? */
7112 er = "OV";
7113 } else {
7114 if (e < -99)
7115 e = -99;
7116 val /= i10x(e); /* Normalize */
7117 }
7118 }
7119 }
7120 }
7121 if (!er) { /* Not error condition */
7122 if (sign == '-')
7123 *buf++ = sign; /* Add a - if negative value */
7124 do { /* Put decimal number */
7125 if (m == -1)
7126 *buf++ = ds; /* Insert a decimal separator when get into fractional part */
7127 w = i10x(m); /* Snip the highest digit d */
7128 d = (int)(val / w);
7129 val -= d * w;
7130 *buf++ = (char)('0' + d); /* Put the digit */
7131 } while (--m >= -prec); /* Output all digits specified by prec */
7132 if (fmt != 'f') { /* Put exponent if needed */
7133 *buf++ = (char)fmt;
7134 if (e < 0) {
7135 e = 0 - e;
7136 *buf++ = '-';
7137 } else {
7138 *buf++ = '+';
7139 }
7140 *buf++ = (char)('0' + e / 10);
7141 *buf++ = (char)('0' + e % 10);
7142 }
7143 }
7144 }
7145 if (er) { /* Error condition */
7146 if (sign)
7147 *buf++ = sign; /* Add sign if needed */
7148 do { /* Put error symbol */
7149 *buf++ = *er++;
7150 } while (*er);
7151 }
7152 *buf = 0; /* Term */
7153}
7154#endif /* FF_PRINT_FLOAT && FF_INTDEF == 2 */
7155
7156int f_printf(
7157 FIL* fp, /* Pointer to the file object */
7158 const TCHAR* fmt, /* Pointer to the format string */
7159 ... /* Optional arguments... */
7160) {
7161 va_list arp;
7162 putbuff pb;
7163 UINT i, j, w, f, r;
7164 int prec;
7165#if FF_PRINT_LLI && FF_INTDEF == 2
7166 QWORD v;
7167#else
7168 DWORD v;
7169#endif
7170 TCHAR* tp;
7171 TCHAR tc, pad;
7172 TCHAR nul = 0;
7173 char d, str[SZ_NUM_BUF];
7174
7175 putc_init(&pb, fp);
7176
7177 va_start(arp, fmt);
7178
7179 for (;;) {
7180 tc = *fmt++;
7181 if (tc == 0)
7182 break; /* End of format string */
7183 if (tc != '%') { /* Not an escape character (pass-through) */
7184 putc_bfd(&pb, tc);
7185 continue;
7186 }
7187 f = w = 0;
7188 pad = ' ';
7189 prec = -1; /* Initialize parms */
7190 tc = *fmt++;
7191 if (tc == '0') { /* Flag: '0' padded */
7192 pad = '0';
7193 tc = *fmt++;
7194 } else if (tc == '-') { /* Flag: Left aligned */
7195 f = 2;
7196 tc = *fmt++;
7197 }
7198 if (tc == '*') { /* Minimum width from an argument */
7199 w = va_arg(arp, int);
7200 tc = *fmt++;
7201 } else {
7202 while (IsDigit(tc)) { /* Minimum width */
7203 w = w * 10 + tc - '0';
7204 tc = *fmt++;
7205 }
7206 }
7207 if (tc == '.') { /* Precision */
7208 tc = *fmt++;
7209 if (tc == '*') { /* Precision from an argument */
7210 prec = va_arg(arp, int);
7211 tc = *fmt++;
7212 } else {
7213 prec = 0;
7214 while (IsDigit(tc)) { /* Precision */
7215 prec = prec * 10 + tc - '0';
7216 tc = *fmt++;
7217 }
7218 }
7219 }
7220 if (tc == 'l') { /* Size: long int */
7221 f |= 4;
7222 tc = *fmt++;
7223#if FF_PRINT_LLI && FF_INTDEF == 2
7224 if (tc == 'l') { /* Size: long long int */
7225 f |= 8;
7226 tc = *fmt++;
7227 }
7228#endif
7229 }
7230 if (tc == 0)
7231 break; /* End of format string */
7232 switch (tc) { /* Atgument type is... */
7233 case 'b': /* Unsigned binary */
7234 r = 2;
7235 break;
7236
7237 case 'o': /* Unsigned octal */
7238 r = 8;
7239 break;
7240
7241 case 'd': /* Signed decimal */
7242 case 'u': /* Unsigned decimal */
7243 r = 10;
7244 break;
7245
7246 case 'x': /* Unsigned hexadecimal (lower case) */
7247 case 'X': /* Unsigned hexadecimal (upper case) */
7248 r = 16;
7249 break;
7250
7251 case 'c': /* Character */
7252 putc_bfd(&pb, (TCHAR)va_arg(arp, int));
7253 continue;
7254
7255 case 's': /* String */
7256 tp = va_arg(arp, TCHAR*); /* Get a pointer argument */
7257 if (!tp)
7258 tp = &nul; /* Null ptr generates a null string */
7259 for (j = 0; tp[j]; j++)
7260 ; /* j = tcslen(tp) */
7261 if (prec >= 0 && j > (UINT)prec)
7262 j = prec; /* Limited length of string body */
7263 for (; !(f & 2) && j < w; j++)
7264 putc_bfd(&pb, pad); /* Left pads */
7265 while (*tp && prec--)
7266 putc_bfd(&pb, *tp++); /* Body */
7267 while (j++ < w)
7268 putc_bfd(&pb, ' '); /* Right pads */
7269 continue;
7270#if FF_PRINT_FLOAT && FF_INTDEF == 2
7271 case 'f': /* Floating point (decimal) */
7272 case 'e': /* Floating point (e) */
7273 case 'E': /* Floating point (E) */
7274 ftoa(str, va_arg(arp, double), prec, tc); /* Make a floating point string */
7275 for (j = strlen(str); !(f & 2) && j < w; j++)
7276 putc_bfd(&pb, pad); /* Left pads */
7277 for (i = 0; str[i]; putc_bfd(&pb, str[i++]))
7278 ; /* Body */
7279 while (j++ < w)
7280 putc_bfd(&pb, ' '); /* Right pads */
7281 continue;
7282#endif
7283 default: /* Unknown type (pass-through) */
7284 putc_bfd(&pb, tc);
7285 continue;
7286 }
7287
7288 /* Get an integer argument and put it in numeral */
7289#if FF_PRINT_LLI && FF_INTDEF == 2
7290 if (f & 8) { /* long long argument? */
7291 v = (QWORD)va_arg(arp, long long);
7292 } else if (f & 4) { /* long argument? */
7293 v = (tc == 'd') ? (QWORD)(long long)va_arg(arp, long) : (QWORD)va_arg(arp, unsigned long);
7294 } else { /* int/short/char argument */
7295 v = (tc == 'd') ? (QWORD)(long long)va_arg(arp, int) : (QWORD)va_arg(arp, unsigned int);
7296 }
7297 if (tc == 'd' && (v & 0x8000000000000000)) { /* Negative value? */
7298 v = 0 - v;
7299 f |= 1;
7300 }
7301#else
7302 if (f & 4) { /* long argument? */
7303 v = (DWORD)va_arg(arp, long);
7304 } else { /* int/short/char argument */
7305 v = (tc == 'd') ? (DWORD)(long)va_arg(arp, int) : (DWORD)va_arg(arp, unsigned int);
7306 }
7307 if (tc == 'd' && (v & 0x80000000)) { /* Negative value? */
7308 v = 0 - v;
7309 f |= 1;
7310 }
7311#endif
7312 i = 0;
7313 do { /* Make an integer number string */
7314 d = (char)(v % r);
7315 v /= r;
7316 if (d > 9)
7317 d += (tc == 'x') ? 0x27 : 0x07;
7318 str[i++] = d + '0';
7319 } while (v && i < SZ_NUM_BUF);
7320 if (f & 1)
7321 str[i++] = '-'; /* Sign */
7322 /* Write it */
7323 for (j = i; !(f & 2) && j < w; j++) { /* Left pads */
7324 putc_bfd(&pb, pad);
7325 }
7326 do { /* Body */
7327 putc_bfd(&pb, (TCHAR)str[--i]);
7328 } while (i);
7329 while (j++ < w) { /* Right pads */
7330 putc_bfd(&pb, ' ');
7331 }
7332 }
7333
7334 va_end(arp);
7335
7336 return putc_flush(&pb);
7337}
7338
7339#endif /* !FF_FS_READONLY */
7340#endif /* FF_USE_STRFUNC */
7341
7342#if FF_CODE_PAGE == 0
7343/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
7344/* Set Active Codepage for the Path Name */
7345/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
7346
7347FRESULT f_setcp(
7348 WORD cp /* Value to be set as active code page */
7349) {
7350 static const WORD validcp[22] = {437, 720, 737, 771, 775, 850, 852, 855, 857, 860, 861, 862, 863, 864, 865, 866, 869, 932, 936, 949, 950, 0};
7351 static const BYTE* const tables[22] = {Ct437, Ct720, Ct737, Ct771, Ct775, Ct850, Ct852, Ct855, Ct857, Ct860, Ct861, Ct862, Ct863, Ct864, Ct865, Ct866, Ct869, Dc932, Dc936, Dc949, Dc950, 0};
7352 UINT i;
7353
7354 for (i = 0; validcp[i] != 0 && validcp[i] != cp; i++)
7355 ; /* Find the code page */
7356 if (validcp[i] != cp)
7357 return FR_INVALID_PARAMETER; /* Not found? */
7358
7359 CodePage = cp;
7360 if (cp >= 900) { /* DBCS */
7361 ExCvt = 0;
7362 DbcTbl = tables[i];
7363 } else { /* SBCS */
7364 ExCvt = tables[i];
7365 DbcTbl = 0;
7366 }
7367 return FR_OK;
7368}
7369#endif /* FF_CODE_PAGE == 0 */
buf
timestamped_frame_t buf
Definition main.c:119
disk_read
DRESULT disk_read(BYTE pdrv, BYTE *buff, DWORD sector, UINT count)
Definition diskio.c:84
disk_initialize
DSTATUS disk_initialize(BYTE pdrv)
Definition diskio.c:47
disk_write
DRESULT disk_write(BYTE pdrv, const BYTE *buff, DWORD sector, UINT count)
